name: Youjo Kodama
author: Raile21
description:
When your time has come, and you close your eyes for a final time, what will you leave behind? When Man has forsaken its once proud nature, what will it become? When forests turn into cities, will you still recognize your old home? When humanity unites, albeit in a strange manner, will you be proud? When your time has come, and you reopen your eyes, will you finally embrace the world anew?

The premise of this story is reincarnating as a Dryad in the future, I hope you will enjoy and comment or give feedback about the story.

Youjo Kodama is my first story on Royalroadl. I draw heavy inspiration from series such as Ciaphas Cain from Warhammer 40K, Star Wars, Youjo Senki, and Overlord. This story combines elements from both Sci-fi and fantasy genres.

You will recognize some elements from those series as I will copy some lore or background elements as I craft them into my own story.

This story could be considered fanfiction but I will bring them together in a new direction.

I hope you will join me on this fantastic adventure. Any comments and feedback are always appreciated.

chapters.name: Prologue
chapters.content:
A devout  Roman Catholic Indonesian businessman, who has reached the age of 200 years old and currently dying on his deathbed surrounded by loved ones, requested that he be buried within a Capsula Mundi burial pod when he dies.

He instructed his descendants that his grave to be placed within the family home and to use a female Ginko Biloba tree as his tombstone.

As the tree itself is robust, hardy and can live for thousands of years, he hopes that when the tree starts to grow fruits, his descendant can enjoy the ginkgo nuts as something to be consumed and enjoyed. He has the hope for his descendants to remember him by, even long after his time has passed.

After 300 years has passed since his loved ones honor his request and buried him on the family property, his body encapsulated within a pod of a female Ginko Biloba tree.

The tree itself is growing and thriving, with time the family members have since grown into a clan and consider the tree as sacred and holy.

But after 300 years things have changed, in this time humanity has also changed but for the worse after encountering the Elven Gallente Federation, the Dwarven Amarr Empire, and the Orcish Minmattar Republic.

Races that have long considered as a Tolkien fantasy by humanity clashed with itself as a futuristic alien race with their own culture and military power.

The first conflict was inevitable in the early years, and humanity suffered for it.

Lives lost, nations fall, religion and culture in shock and upheaval. Historians refer to the time as a dark age of conflict and suffering as compared to the strength and military power of the other races; humanity is the weakest of them all while fractured and divided into separate nations, languages, and cultures.

Forged under severe and numerous hardships, humanity itself is eventually reborn, united and fought back as the Caldari State, a proud race built on the tenets of patriotism and capitalism.

It is led by rulers who are determined to see it return to the meritocratic ideals of old. Ruthless and efficient in the boardroom as well as on the battlefield, humanity is living emblems of strength, persistence, and dignity.

As a state built on corporate capitalism, the Caldari State is run by a few mega-corporations which divide the State between them, controlling and ruling every aspect of society.

Each corporation is made up of thousands of smaller companies, ranging from industrial companies to law firms.

All land and real estate are under the ownership of a company which leases it to the citizens, and independent companies also handle the government and police services.

The Caldari State stands for corporate capitalism in its purest form.

Eight great Corporations together own more than 90% of all property within the State.

If you find this story on Amazon, be aware that it has been stolen. Please report the infringement.

Each of the corporations is made up of thousands of companies of various sizes and various sorts, ranging from pure mining companies to great police companies.

There is no single, unified government as such; each corporation rules its territories like their kingdom with little or no interference from the other corporations.

Competition, efficiency, and market share are more important to the corporations than the accumulation of wealth (although the latter is often a happy by-product of the former).

Business for the good of the individual rather than the good of the many is something alien to the Caldari.

In higher matters, such as in foreign policy towards the other empires, the Board of Directors, which consists of the CEOs of the eight major corporations, has the highest authority.

The Board of Directors also makes sure that the social infrastructure of the State remains intact and settles all major quarrels between the corporations.

The eight mega-corporations of the Caldari State are Sukuuvestaa Corporation, Nugoeihuvi Corporation, CBD Corporation, Ishukone Corporation, Hyasyoda Corporation, Kaalakiota Corporation, Wiyrkomi Corporation and finally Lai Dai Corporation.

The mega-corporations are further divided into three major factions as follows the Practicals, the Liberals, and the Patriots.

They are the three power blocs in the Caldari corporate world. For the most part, what passes for political affiliation in the Caldari State is achieved at the corporate scale, with the majority of employees indoctrinated into their corporation's prevailing philosophy.

There are exceptions, particularly where employees have transferred between corporations, but these are few and far between.

Although each corp is also a unique study in and of itself, containing within it many different positions and dogmas, the political mindsets of the Caldari are categorized into three main factions.

The Sukuuvestaa Corporation, CBD Corporation, and Nugoeihuvi Corporation between them make up the Practical faction, which cares little for limiting concepts like ethics. This bloc is frequently associated with organized crime and has an exploitative view of international trade. It also takes a zero-sum view of profit and loss in cluster-wide markets.

Next, the Liberals faction, comprised of the Hyasyoda Corporation and Ishukone Corporation, the Liberals bloc believes in the principles of free trade and cooperative relations with foreign powers. They are the most active supporters of alien integration in the Caldari State, with the highest percentage of cross-racial marriage within the State.

And finally, generally regarded as the most powerful faction, the Patriots are an alliance of Lai Dai Corporation, Wiyrkomi Corporation, and the mighty Kaalakiota Corporation, who between them and their subsidiaries possess capabilities rivaling those of the other two Caldari political factions combined. They are genuinely patriotic and incredibly proud, less concerned with trade, and more with the position of the Caldari politically and militarily in the international community.

Even though there is a healthy competition in between the mega-corporations and the major factions, against the other races, all three political blocs will stand united and strike with the force of an avalanche, earning victories from the jaw of defeat.

Common are the stories of humanity fighting until the last and stories of sacrifices made by heroic individuals who sacrificed themselves, stories of humanity fighting viciously and tenaciously for their species have won them respect from their enemies.

Humanity is known as the living emblems of strength, persistence, and dignity in the eyes of galactic civilizations.

It is in this kind of world, the same tree within a now influential Caldari clan starts glowing and pulsing, and within the bark, a small figure emerged, feminine and petite with leaves instead of hairs and barks instead of skin covering her body.

This chapter is the start of the saga of Raine the Virtuous, reborn as Being Y.

chapters.name: Chapter 1
chapters.content:
The first thing “it” felt was the soft light coming from behind “it.”

Surrounded by the surreal feeling of gentleness and warmth, “it” enjoyed a brief moment of peace.

This warm, yet slightly prickly sensation could ultimately make one forget oneself.

Right, as if something was lost, but what was it?

What was the thing that has been forgotten?

Before even thinking about it, “it” started to tremble all of a sudden.

After a short moment of delay, “it”  ’s mind began to comprehend the feeling of coldness.

A coldness that could penetrate the skin, just like a newborn baby feeling cold for the first time.

However, the subject in mind didn’t have the luxury to experience it in full.

With the consciousness murky and the sense of self a mess, “it” opened its eyes to a dark metal skyline crisscrossed with lights and windows facing “it.”

A blurry world ahead of “it”  ’s vision.

No, perhaps it was only its vision that was blurred?

It was a twisted world seen through unfitting spectacles.

The outlines were blurry, and there are many chaotic movements and sounds around “it,” even “it” who had not felt as many emotions in all those years began to sense the unease.

After what “it” felt to be a hundred years long, “it” finally started to gain back its consciousness and form, feeling only pure confusion.

Just what the heck is going on? What happened to “it”?

“It” entered a vessel that was unable to maintain consciousness for an extended period, and still couldn’t rightly recall this information.

After that, although still confused, “it” had finally gained a general idea of the situation “it” was currently in, yet even then, it only further added to its confusion.

“It” clearly remembered that “it” was at home lying on a bed, surrounded by loved ones and feeling pain all over until the pain gradually disappears and “it’ finally felt peace.

However, after snapping back to reality, “it” found itself inside a large, metal-built utilitarian enclosure with a series of radar dishes facing “it”  ’s way and blurry images of what looks like a group of people in white scientist coat holding and carrying a multitude of scientific equipment.

Now and then flashes of light can be seen from one or two of the blurry people and “it” wonders what the commotions are all about.

“It” gazed down and looks at “it “s hands and curiously found that it looks smaller, more slender compared to what “it” is used to and realized that “it “s hands are covered in tree barks with a round gem, the color of its surrounding bark, lodged into the back of each hand.

Continuing from “it “s hands unto her body, which looks like normal skin, “it realizes that “it” is naked and with surprise “it” realizes that “it” has lost an essential part of itself that used to be in between “it “s legs, the legs which are also smaller, slimmer and covered in barks compared to what “it” s used to.

Feeling a brief sadness for the loss and then swiftly disappears into indifference and lack of concern.

“It” starts to remember “it “s life before “it” came into consciousness,“it” has not been using that which has been lost for reproductive purpose for more than half of “it” s life or around 120 years more or less but “it” can concede that it made it more convenient to relieve “it” self in daily life, so it’s loss will be missed.

However, when “it “s eyes could finally begin to see clearly of its surroundings, all that was in view under the lights were the figures of scientists wearing futuristic-looking outfit and gears.

Some are taking notes into a tablet-like device, and more than a few are staring at “it” with eyes fully open and alert, watching and following every small movement “it” made, especially “it” s head and limbs.

“It” feels that the reason for the harsh bright light in front of her is due to the group of scientist gathering to know more about “it” somehow.

“It” realizes that having barks as the skin on “it” s limbs may be beyond normal, but some of the scientist’s eyes became focused on something behind “it.”

Perhaps what “it” felt of the dim light and soft warmth on “it” s back is part of the reason so many scientists are gathering and observing “it.”

Curious about the intense interest of the scientists “it” rotates “it “s body and found to its surprise and delight a mesmerizing sight that “it” can vaguely remember to have never seen in “it “s long life of 200 years.

They are there standing in front of “it,” as wide as three adult men standing tall on top of each other and as tall as a ten story building, a large and towering tree reaching to the roof of the enclosure and softly glowing with what “it” can say genuinely felt magical.

A case of theft: this story is not rightfully on Amazon; if you spot it, report the violation.From the way, the warm light felt pulsing into and out of the tree like inhaling carbon dioxide and exhaling oxygen like a regular tree.

“It” can felt a change when the warm light went into the tree and what light came out of the tree feel richer and thicker.

The cycle continues as “it” felt the process looping and filling the chamber of the metal enclosure with the warm light feeling.

Eyes closed “it” stands there not knowing how long and “it” feels something like branches growing out of “it” s back and the leaves absorbing the warm light into its center, right inside the torso area.

It is a different feeling compared to anything “it” has ever experienced, a sense of fulfillment, of the drive, of life, strengthening of what it felt as it’s soul’s connection to its body.

Memories start resurfacing, of what he was and with it came knowledge and understanding.

“He” was a human man, who has lived his life and expected to be rewarded with everlasting peace with those that have passed on before him.

And in a way, he did experience peace looking at the tree that must have been the same tree that he instructed to be buried in when he passed away.

Significant time must have passed for the tree to be grown to such a size.

Once again looking back at his genital or the lack of it, he sighed and felt that the reason why he was gender-bent must be because the tree itself happens to be female.

Perhaps it was something like an incubation, and the body he is inhabiting is grown as a reflection of the tree itself.

As he felt the branches on his back suddenly retracting back inside without his conscious action, soon after he felt something covering his body from neck to bottom.

Turning around, he sees one of the scientists has taken off her white coat and putting it on his body to protect his modesty.

The scientist looks to be around middle aged with black hair tied in a ponytail, she looks at him nervously and can be seen trying to be friendly and non-threatening in its gesture and body language.

The rest of the scientists are behind her giving an ample space, and now that he has the time and no longer in a state of confusion he realizes that most are young looking individuals and are probably just only starting as a scientist.

That makes the woman in front of her, their instructor, or someone of a more senior position.

“Do you understand me? Can you speak English?”

He can understand her correctly, thank you very much but since he was not a talkative person even when he was still alive as a human man.

So he stared at the woman and nodded slightly.

He doesn’t know what he has become now, but surely it was not human anymore, but he can still have common decency and politeness as a former human.

Who knows maybe they can help him figure out things, but if they start cutting him up to find out more about his body, he can perhaps find out how strong his new limbs and body instead.

The woman in front of her looks glad and more confident as the ability to communicate are an excellent prospect for sentient beings to understand each other and cooperate.

Unknown to him, the lesson of the first contact war burdens her mind heavily before the confirmation of shared language he has given.

“That is good. Do you have a name young miss?”

Once again, he was reminded of the current gender of the body “he” currently has.

With both hands feeling around, looking for the genital he lacked, finding none, he sighed and decided that when in Rome do what the Romans do.

Which means that it would be for the best to accept that starting from now he has to accept the fact that he is now no longer a man, not human withstanding, and refer to itself appropriately for his sake of mind.

And he would prefer not to clarify or to explain every single time why he insists he is a man when it is evident he is not.

His name as a human man and the name as a female of indeterminable species should be different as he would like to keep his memory of when he was once human, and the new memory after his rebirth should be different lest he forgets what he once was and replaced it with new memories.

Some of those old memories are valuable and precious to him, damn it.

“Yes, my name was once Rocky... But please call me Raine instead.”

After introducing herself, she starts walking forward towards the group of the young scientist as she can see a closed door behind them, leaving behind the middle-aged woman behind her.

It’s time she finds some answers.

chapters.name: Chapter 2
chapters.content:
Leaving the stunned woman behind while still wearing her coat left a bad feeling within her, but it can't be helped.

Who knows how long the red tape would need to run until someone tells her anything?

It would be better to explore while she still can and know something rather than nothing.

Talking about the white coat, how small was she that the edge of the lab coat could reach her ankle?

Fidgeting a bit at her coat and lamenting her bare-footedness, as the ground are slippery, and the grip of her soles are less than ideal, but the bark on the bottom of her feets is doing its job as she would have complained about the gravel if she still has her normal human skin instead of bark.

Looking at the group of young scientists ahead of her and assuming that the standard adult height now is still 170 cm or 5 foot 6 inches for an adult male.

Then extrapolating the angle that she can see from her eyes to the distance between them she roughly gauges her height to be around 120cm or 4 foot tall, which is the average height for a nine years old girl.

It would be a problem if she needs to overpower someone, but her small stature should make it easier for her to hide if need be.

Unfortunately, she was so focused on calculating the height that she has gotten careless.

She slipped on the wet ground and resulted in her falling face first on the ground.

There was an awkward silence after she slipped, and there was a faint feeling of embarrassment, but after a while, she lifted her head, and everyone that she can see is shocked at her sudden movement.

"Umu..."

She pouted and puffed her cheek, and even though she realized it is childish to do so.

But she cannot help it.

It is because while she is unhurt from the fall, her pride is another matter entirely.

After standing up and brushing off the dust coating, her white coat has become a bit stained.

She tried to save what pride she had left by quickly schooling her facial expression into a stern and commanding one and quickly pointing straight at the group of young scientists with a flourish.

"You did not see that."

Not knowing what to do the group of scientist awkwardly looked at each other as if asking what should they do in this situation from their colleagues.

None of them dare to laugh at the subject of their interest and nervousness.

Chance!

While everyone is distracted, she quickly rushed towards the closed door by going through the group of people in her way.

Shocked, some people jumped out of the way and capitalizing on the path which has suddenly become clear, and dodging the reluctant attempt to grab her, she maneuvers through them like an expert.

In a short time, she managed to exit the group, and the way is clear to the door.

She prays in her heart that the door is automatic, as she made the short distance, and is glad to be rewarded as the door automatically opens as she enters the brightly lit and utilitarian hallway.

As the door moved to close, she can hear the shout of the middle-aged woman whose white scientist coat she wore.

"Don't just stand there like an idiot! Catch her quickly!"

Before the group of people can react, the door has closed, and she moved quickly again, not waiting around for them to catch up she runs through the hallway like greased lightning.

"Pisha...Pisha...Pisha."

She murmured random words, even though she's unsure why exactly she is saying those words, but it seems appropriate when chased and needs to escape in haste.

She had distanced herself quite far before the closed door opened again, and a mob of people rushed out looking for her.

They managed to spot a glimpse of her as she turns to the left of the intersection.

She sees a closet nearby, she rushed in and closed the door behind her.

She looks around, and she can see cleaning supplies as well as other random tools inside the cramped room.

Behind her, she can hear the thunderous stampede of panicked mob chasing after her.

Reacting with quick reflexes, she jumped and used both of her hands and legs as she holds herself horizontally above the narrow space above the doorway.

She can hear someone shouting curses from behind the door as she tensed her body and trying to be quiet.

"Shit! I don't see her anymore! She runs fast for a kid! Come on! I saw her going this way! We need to catch her, or it's our head on the line guys!"

After that, she can hear the mob running down the hallway towards the direction they believe she has moved.

As the sound grows fainter with distance, she congratulates herself for her brilliant idea and quick action as she began to relax.

"Sigh the boys have certainly landed themselves in big trouble this time. I have never seen our instructor be that mad before."

She heard someone's conversation and footsteps through the closet door and started tensing again.

"True, but the guys are chasing after her like the hounds of hell themselves are chasing them you know?"

"With the importance of this project to the managers, do you blame them? I know the management also pressurized the instructor for this project. I wouldn't be surprised if the culprit or culprits of this fiasco are dumped into deep space as punishment."

"You're kidding. Anyway, do you girls think the guys have missed checking this closet in their rush to chase her?"

Shit, cold sweat starts to pour out of her like a waterfall as she hears a group of them approaching her hiding place.

"I don't know, it could be, but it won't hurt for us to check again."

Please no, please don't open the door.

She prays fervently to anyone who will listen.

Looking down, she can see the doorknob turning, and the door opens as a young woman walks in through the door looking around.

You might be reading a stolen copy. Visit Royal Road for the authentic version.

"No, there isn't anyone here. It looks like the guys have checked this place already."

Don't look up, don't look up.

Cold sweat starts collecting at the tip of her nose as the young woman below her turns around to look outside the door.

Don't drop, don't drop.

However, no one answers her prayers as a drop of sweat falls from her nose and to her perspective it's like seeing the water droplet fell in slow motion as it starts to approach the top of the woman's head below her.

As the drop impacted the top of her head, she screams, and her heart drops to her stomach.

"Ewww! I've got dirty water dripping on my head! Let's look somewhere else. Everyone is looking for her, so it's only a matter of time until she is found."

As the woman below her turns, exit the closet and closed the door.

By using all her willpower, she managed to stop herself from sighing as she can hear footsteps becoming fainter as the group moved farther and farther away from her hiding place.

She did not dare to move from her place as she calms her beating heart.

Wait...

She can't feel her beating heart!

She dropped down to the ground, and she presses her hands towards her chest, trying to feel around for any heartbeat.

After a while, she gives up and feeling her wrist for a pulse instead.

Which also resulted in the conclusion that there is no pulse that she can detect!

Schooling her facial expression and calming her mind, she tried to feel what else is different about her body.

In the total silence of the closet room, she ponders and considers.

Wait... Total silence?

She cannot hear the sound of her breathing!

How is it possible?

Then how does she move if there is no process of using oxygen to convert food matter into energy through the chemical process and the distribution of said energy and oxygen throughout her body!

As she sits cross-legged on the ground, she tried to think about this logically.

Isn't she at least half plant?

So how do plants breathe?

She knows that plants exchange carbon dioxide and replace it with oxygen, and with photosynthesis, there is the creation of energy and water for the nutrient distribution within the stems.

While rooted in thought, she unconsciously resorts to twirling her hair.

She then freezes and stares at her hair, which is a leaf she realizes that the leaves are her method of air absorption!

She breathes through her hair, which is leaves!

Nodding with the revelation, she files it as part of her new body information but laments that this means she has to keep her hair long if she wants to breathe better and that means cutting her hair short to be her natural manly hairstyle to be out of the question.

Now that is settled, she tries to think about what she should do now while everyone is out searching for her.

From the words of the young woman earlier, they sounded very confident that they will find her eventually.

That means where ever she is now would be a secure place, and in the event of her escape, the facility would be under lockdown with no one being able to come in or going out of the facility.

If everyone expects her to flee, then they would seal the exits and do a sweep of the entire facility while looking for her.

Then what can she do?

What can she use in this closet room, and what does she have available to her right now?

Standing up and looking around once more, she sees cleaning supplies and cleaning equipment which is worthless to her in her current situation.

Then what does she have with her now?

The white coat the woman gave her earlier, but there is nothing in the pockets and maybe her small body for hiding.

Her small body.

An inkling of a crazy idea starts forming inside her mind.

It is so crazy that it might just work!

She didn't have any better idea, and the alternative is capture and whatever it is they are going to do to her.

If everyone expects her to try to escape, then she will stay nearby the place where she started instead! While staring at a medium-sized carton box of cleaning supplies on the rack near the floor. She lifts it, opens it, and takes out all the large bottles of cleaning solution inside it.

After taking out a dozen of the large bottles, the available space is enough for her to lay herself inside the box.

She slides the cleaning solution bottles sideways under the rack and puts it tidily and nicely as if the janitor is trying to conserve available space.

Next, she puts the empty carton box back on the shelf where it originally was, though she put the empty box sideways with the top box opening facing her.

As she calculates in her mind, she took a step back and then jumped in the opening of the carton box while tucking in her arms and legs.

The force of her action pushed the carton box in and rotated it back so that the cardboard box opening is back on top again.

She did this because there is no space even for her small body to squeeze through if she tried to enter it the usual way in between the different layers of the rack.

Even though it is a bit cramped inside, she wiggled her body to make it more comfortable for her and closed the opening of the carton box by crisscrossing the flaps to seal the box from the inside.

Feeling secure, now she needs to wait it out while everyone is looking for her in vain.

She cutely yawns as she became sleepy.

Maybe she will sleep first and when she wakes up surely everyone who is looking for her would have given up already.

"Good night everyone..."

As her eyes flutter to a close, she wills herself to sleep while waiting for her chance to move out again.

chapters.name: Chapter 3
chapters.content:
Her eyes twitched, and her subconscious mind keeps nagging at her to wake up.

So with reluctance, she opens her eyes and fully yawns.

Blinking her drowsiness away, she raises her arm above her head to lower the carton box flap, and quietly she peeks through the opening to make sure that the coast is clear.

Seeing no one inside the closet room with her, she then closes her eyes again and proceed to strain her ears, trying to hear any sound coming through the closet door.

After a while, with some certainty, she is quite sure that there is no one near the closet or around the nearby hallway.

With a soft grunt, she prepares her body and then launches a sideway roll to the side of the carton box which is facing the center of the closet.

Her body rolls out of the carton box.

She then falls slightly to the floor as she continues rolling through the central area of the closet and hit the shelves on the opposite side with her face.

"Chiiiiiiiiii..........!"

She squeals in pain as she holds her face with both hands.

Unfortunately it only irritates the skin of her face as the rough texture of the bark covering her hands adds to her pain.

She let go of her face as she was left with no choice but raise her arms fully extended above her head and then proceed to roll quickly from side to side on the closet floor to distract her from her pain.

"Chiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii.......Chiiiiiiiiiii......Chiiiii.........Chi...."

She extends her soft squeal to let out the pain in a lower volume so that she would not be heard and found after reaching this stage of her escape.

After a while, her pain fades away, with a grunt she raised her upper body and sits cross-legged on the closet floor.

As she straightens up, her gaze landed on a suit of janitor overall hanging off the hook at the back of the entrance door that was not there before she went to sleep inside the box.

She tilted her head to the left and saw in the corner of her eyes more things which were not there before she went to sleep.

Standing up, she walked toward the entrance door and grabbed a pair of long yellow rubber gloves for cleaning.

The sentence, ideal disguise, crosses her mind as she beheld the pair of gloves and proceeded to insert her hands and pulled the gloves all the way up to her shoulder.

Due to her small stature, the rubber gloves that an adult would normally only be able to wear up to the elbow, but for her it can be pulled up to her shoulder instead.

Her only gripe is that the pair of gloves is too large for her hands and arms.

As she thought that, the gloves suddenly adjusted itself and shrank in size until it fits her perfectly up to her shoulder.

"Hmm, the future is convenient."

She nodded in approval for the progress of technology during her absence.

Feeling more confident, she picked up the pair of rubber boots from the corner and wears it, and again it adjusted its size by itself to fit her perfectly.

Now that her limbs are covered, she looks almost perfectly normal.

Well if you didn't count her full head of leaves, as she puffed at a leafy bang blocking her eye away.

She then reached for the last item which was not in the closet last time.

Her hand grips the backpack hanging from the floor, and to her disappointment, it was lightweight even for her.

She unzips the backpack and can only found an adult magazine, a pack of cigarettes and a bundle of something made from straw tied together.

Dejected, she unwraps the bundle and found to her delight, a large Mexican sombrero hat with the word fiesta painted on it.

Happily, she wears the sombrero hat, as she makes sure to bundle up all her leaves inside and tie the sombrero hat tightly and securely against her chin.

Looking up and down, after covering everything that doesn't look human and with the oversized white scientist coat, she nodded in satisfaction.

She now looks like a child of one of the scientists trying to help clean up their parent's laboratory and playing with the Mexican sombrero hat they found in the storage room.

Even the dirt covering the coat back when she fell to the ground added to the illusion.

Now that she feels that she is ready to venture out of her hiding place, she approaches the closet door and with confidence, quietly turns the knob leading to the hallway.

Peeking through the gap, she confirms that the coast is clear and then proceeds to close the door behind her.

She decided to continue walking down the hall from earlier as she turns her head around and looks towards the other path of the intersection, the one leading to the right from the intersection.

She knows that road is blocked to her, as she suspects that the entrance leading to the large cavern where the glowing tree is located would be guarded by a pair of guards now and surely if she walks towards the other side they will spot her crossing and give chase.

Shaking her head, she turns back towards the hallway, which is on the left of the intersection, where the mob chasing her originally saw her running towards.

Confident that this is the better decision, she walks at a sedate pace while looking down and proceeds to sway from side to side to sell the illusion of a carefree child.

She didn't dare to look up.

Usually there would be security cameras installed on the roof and just because she couldn't see one doesn't mean that they are not there.

However, that begs the question why they didn't check the footage and see her going in the closet, but crossed it out from her mind as maybe it was simply bad design planning on their part.

As it could be the camera angle or the different camera's coverage are not converging properly.

Whatever it is, their mistake is her gain, as otherwise she would already have been caught in her sleep by now.

As she walks through the hallway, she passed a few locked doors, and she tried to open every door she passed by pressing the buttons beside the door, but all of them refused to open.

On the upside,  she didn't see anyone so far, and she hopes it would keep being that way.

Ahead of her she can see another intersection, and she has two choices here, she can continue walking straight ahead, or she can turn right towards another hallway.

The straight path is clear, but the path to the right is the one she is uncertain.

She proceeds to press her body against the wall leading towards the right hallway.

Next, she stops at the corner and slowly sneaks a peek towards that hallway, and seeing that the coast is also clear she took a step and moved in.

"Hey! This is a restricted area! You're not supposed to be here!"

A loud voice boomed from a distance, directed towards her.

Frozen in shock, one of her legs still raised she turns her head sideways towards the straight path.

There was another intersection down the hallway, hidden from her sight due to an unfortunate angle, and from that intersection, an obviously angry security guard walks toward her at a fast pace.

Act cute!

"Nyaaaa..?"

She tilted her head and meowed at the approaching guard.

The guard visibly wilted at her act and his anger can be seen quickly deflating.

Success!

"Tch, this is why I told those guys we should have put all the kids together and lock all of them in one room."

The guard complained as he gently reaches out to me and put his hand on my back.

"Come now, little girl follow me. I'll bring you back, and you can find your parents there." Said the strict guard as he pushes her gently towards the intersection where he came from.

Double Success!

Seeing no other choice and feeling positive, she still remembers to pout like a child being denied sweets under these circumstances.

She walks for a while under the guidance of the guard as she starts to see more and more people.

Some are guards, and some look like admin staff, but so far she hasn't seen the group of scientist she first encountered earlier.

Most of them ignored her and her guide, but some lightly smiled at her, which is good as most of them looks sleep deprived and have eye bags under their eyes.

Is it because of her, she wonders?

Ahead she can see a pair of guards standing at attention, guarding a large entrance, and inside she can see a large group of people wearing casual clothes milling about and having some hot food and drinks while chatting with each other.

She can also see some small kids zooming here and there playing with each other.

As she and her guard approach them, one of them raised his hand and greeted her guard.

"Hi there Alan. Found a straggler have you?" The other guard chuckles and shakes his head.

Scowling, her guard overtakes her and put his hand on top of her head.

"Shut it, Bruce. You wouldn't believe where I found this little squirt. She managed to find her way into the restricted zone after the lockdown we just went through." Said her guard as he lifted his hand from her head and back to his side.

"Impressive, she might make a good mercenary one day." Said another pair of guard as he put his right hand on his chin in a thoughtful manner while staring at her.

"Well, they are not paying me enough to go through all this bullshit while babysitting a kid. Anyway, take her off my hand Bob. I have to get back on my patrol on the restricted zone. Though how am I supposed to know what I am trying to find if the brass refused to tell us what is the actual thing we're supposed to find is beyond me." Said, my guard, as he crossed his arms and as I fidgeted uncomfortably behind him.

"You said it Alan. I don't understand why the brass only said 'You'll know it when you see it.' which is bullshit if I ever heard one." Complained Bob as he looks at me again.

"Anyway, we're talking too much, the little girl looks uncomfortable standing there already listening to us yakking. We'll let her in Alan, just go back to your patrol before you get in trouble." Said, Bob, as he gestured for me to come in the cafeteria.

I moved forward and tried to look sullenly as I pass both guards standing sentinel at the cafeteria entrance.

"Yeah, you're right, but I hope they didn't ask us to find a face hugger! Asking us to check in pairs, I tragically shot Kenny in panic as the thing lodged to his face! Thankfully the brass cleared me of murder and manslaughter. Though we have to cremate Kenny on the brass insistence." Lamented my guard Alan as he remembers his good friend Kenny.

She prickles her ears when she hears about a face-hugger, and proceeds to sit on a nearby cafeteria bench near the entrance directly opposite the entrance as she tried to eavesdrop on their conversation, a face-hugger sounds interesting.

"Ha! I remembered that! The brass supplied everyone with alcoholic drinks after that, as if it makes up for Kenny's death. Horrible what happens to Kenny but his drink was good, so I toasted for him in death and his honor. Though after that we forgot to ask what the heck killed Kenny." said Bruce, the guard as he guffawed loudly.

"Don't know, don't care, goodbye. I'll get back on my patrol." said Alan tersely as he huffed and walked away.

The guard, Bruce, stared bewilderedly at Alan's retreating back.

"What's that about eh?" Bruce asked while looking towards his colleague Bob.

"You're an ass, of course, he would be angry. Kenny is his good friend." Bob said shaking his head at his friend rudeness.

"Well then, as far as I am concerned, may a face-hugger deepthroat him as well. He is a jerk." Bruce said with annoyance while brushing off an imaginary dust from his shoulder.

"Said the pot calling the kettle black." Bob replied and to which Bruce shrugged unconcernedly.

Is the show over?

Disappointed at the lack of clarification, she proceeds to stand again before hearing a commotion from outside the cafeteria. Pausing and observing the cafeteria entrance she could hear the sound growing larger which sounds like a woman pleas.

The two guards standing near the entrance are now both looking sideways toward the disturbance in the distance.

"No please! It was not my fault! Don't do this to me! I've worked so hard for the project! I demand to see the manager!"

She can hear a woman's pleading voice but kept her attention towards the entrance until she can see a woman being dragged by two guards passing through the cafeteria entrance.

To her surprise, she recognized the woman as the same middle-aged scientist woman she met before and to the scientist's surprise,  as both their eyes met, the scientist does as well.

"There! She's there! She's standing there all this while, and you all have the guts to blame me for incompetence! You're all idiots! The lot of you!" The scientist with bloodshot eyes screams as she pointed wildly at me even though being held tightly by the two guards from both her sides.

Following the direction of the finger pointing at her, both the guards holding the scientist stopped and stared at her while Bruce and Bob are looking at her like she has grown a second head.

Frozen with fear after being exposed by a last minute God's Grace for the condemned scientist, only one thought crossed her mind.

Oh, fudge you face-hugger... Fudge you.

chapters.name: Chapter 4
chapters.content:
Well, suffice to say that after the grand exposure in the cafeteria and without any other escape route besides the one in front of her, she was swiftly and without fuss captured by the guards.

One of the unnamed guards escorted the relieved scientist somewhere else while the other unnamed guard put both of his hands on her shoulders and sternly steered her forward until both of us enters an executive office.

Thankfully, they didn't take anything from her, and her disguise is still on, so she attracted less attention from everyone that she passed on the way to this office.

And based on the plaque on the door and the luxurious setting it’s fair that the person she will see is undoubtedly an important person in this place.

Inside the office, the first thing she saw was the back of a swivel chair facing the large window in front of her.

“We have her. The scientist is being held in her quarter for now. What do you want me to do next, director?”  Said the unnamed guard who is holding her captive.

The swivel chair turns around, and she can see sitting on the chair, a woman with gray eyes, with blonde hairs tied into a ponytail, wearing a black long sleeve sweater with one hand under her chin and the other hand stroking a white Persian cat, purring on her legs. The sight reminded her of a cliche James Bond villain. If she wanted to convey the image of villainy and power, then she has certainly achieved that.

“No, thank you. You can leave us and go back to the scientist quarter, inform her that I will reinstate her position and convey my apology to her for the trouble.” said the cliche James Bond villain.

Her guard stood at attention and fisted his right hand over his heart as he crisply turns around and exits the office room, leaving her behind with the woman in front of her.

“Greetings honored ancestor, you have given us quite the scare by disappearing on us last night. However, now that you are here with us I suppose all’s well that end’s well. Oh, where are my manners? Let me introduce myself, my name is Alakoni Ishanoya, the CEO of Lai Dai group of companies and I will be the host for your esteemed being while you are here with us. Please come closer and take a seat” Said the woman as she genuinely smiled at her, then gesturing at her from across the large executive desk.

Raising her eyes, she approached her and took a seat on one of the chairs on Alakoni’s opposite.

“Honored ancestor? No offense. But you don’t look Asian to me.” she said with uncertainty.

“Ah, I apologized honored ancestor for my appearance. However nowadays everyone is of mixed-blood, there are very few pure-blooded people nowadays. I am afraid pure Asian, Caucasian and other races of the past are a rarity in today’s society.” Said Alakoni Ishanoya.

“No, that is not an issue, I apologize for asking such a question in our first meeting.” She said with politeness.

The woman across her then let go of the cat sitting on her leg, as the cat hissed at her while raising her tail and walked away with an annoyed pose. She then picked up a tray from her desk and offered it to her by placing it in front of her.

“Are you hungry? You can eat this if you wish.” Said Alakoni as she lifted the cover of the dish.

In front of her she sees a plate of golden nuggets with a side of dipping sauce beside it, feeling hungry, she reached out, dipping it in the sauce and eats it with gusto. Feeling bliss at the taste of the golden nuggets, she continues stuffing the golden nuggets with alacrity.

“I am glad you enjoyed it, honored ancestor. My daughter also enjoys eating it so I suspect you might as well.” Mrs. Alakoni said with relief.

“Hmm, it is good. What is it called?” She said as she chews with a mouthful of food.

“It’s called protein delicacies, honored ancestor.” Mrs. Alakoni said with respect.

“It’s very nice, but I don’t recognize the taste. What is it made of?” She said as she swallowed the food in her mouth.

“Mostly organic waste, honored ancestor.” Mrs. Alakoni said with a straight face.

She was stretching her hand to take another nugget before what she said registered in her mind, and she freezes, looking at her in horror. Mrs. Alakoni seems to take a look at her and laughs softly.

“Oh, that never gets old.” Said Mrs. Alakoni as she reached out, took a nugget, dipping it in sauce and promptly throws it into her mouth, eating it.

She stared at Mrs. Alakoni while looking bewildered at the fact that it's made of organic waste, but she still can eat it like there is nothing wrong with it.

“It’s perfectly safe to eat honored ancestor. Protein delicacies are safe for human consumption, it went through a strict safety process in a sterile environment and made using advanced bioreactor by the Sukuvestaa corporation. And above all, it i nutritious, cheap and in abundance. The flavor can also be adjusted inside the bioreactor.” Said Mrs. Alakoni as she swallows the food in her mouth.

“Even if it is, what would force people to make the decision to resort to this?” She said in confusion as she stares at Mrs. Alakoni.

“Well, it's because it is no longer possible to grow food in a wasteland, honored ancestor.” said Mrs. Alakoni.

“Wasteland? What sort of wasteland?” she said with curiosity.

“The kind of wasteland with an everlasting winter. The whole world is covered in snow and ice, even now outside this facility there is a blizzard raging.” Mrs. Alakoni answered.

“A blizzard in South East Asia?!” She said with shock.

“Yes, and the climate is still milder here under the equator, compared to anywhere else.The difference is we have more blizzard than other places.” Replied Mrs. Alakoni.

“Why would there be winter wasteland across the world? Did we have a nuclear war and bombed each other into oblivion during my absence? What happened to Global Warming?” She said mildly as she calmed down and shot a barrage of questions.

“Oh, nothing of the sort I assure you. And I forget that in your time global warming was still an issue. Alright, so at one point global warming has worsened and as ocean level rises and extreme weather event was happening once a month. Keep in mind that at that time we already have spaceships in orbit and was colonizing Mars after the moon was fully developed as a colony. Well, the current governing body of the world at that time have the brilliant idea of making a large hole in the ozone layer using the spaceships in orbit. The theory was to let out the greenhouse gases by venting it into space, for comparison, it's like opening the lid of a pot which is boiling over. The plan was to do it over the Atlantic ocean and done during the nighttime so as not to be exposed to the sun’s radiation without an ozone layer.” said Mrs. Alakoni like a lecturer.

She nodded, and from the sound of it, it does make some sense.

“What went wrong? She said as she realizes that something was missing from the equation.

“Well, they miscalculate how the ozone layer will cover the hole after we made the hole in the first place. It was assumed that the hole would be covered fairly quickly after the build up heat escapes to space. At first, the plan works, as the temperature rapidly dropped as the built up greenhouse gases escaped to space. What we did not consider at that time was the same built up greenhouse gases was blocking the ozone layer which was trying to fill in the gap in the atmosphere. Like trying to close a balloon which is deflating and expecting the opening to seal itself while air is still escaping. Long story short by the time the ozone hole closes itself 12 hours later, there are no more greenhouse gasses inside the planet atmosphere, the Atlantic ocean became one big chunk of ice, forming the new central pole, this was after the north pole, and south pole disappears mind you. You can imagine what this does to agriculture, with the temperature dropping, harvests failed, and there was a food shortage. It would have been a problem to feed so many people, but unfortunately billions perished in the cold, frozen to death in the aftermath. There are survivors, but they are faced with starvation as we cannot grow food with the weather condition as it is. Back then, the decision was made to use bioreactor to feed our population by recycling our waste. Ironically, another effect was that overnight this killed the green industry as we would need to add more greenhouse gases to the atmosphere instead of reducing it, that means more coal powered plants needed to be built and cars using fossil fuels needed to be used to restore life to the planet. At first, people resist eating such food, but faced with starvation and death, people’s perception changed as well as priority. Nowadays even after the crisis has passed, we continue production as people’s perception changed and as culturally it is something which is considered as something that has saved our species from extinction.” said Mrs. Alakoni still in her lecturer mode.

She nodded and filed it in her memory as something which is considered common sense in this new world.

“Now that you have known some of our histories, you now know one of the major change that happened during your absence, honored ancestor. May I know what is your plan now?” Mrs. Alakoni asked her.

“I am not a prisoner?” She asked with a tilt of her head.

“Oh no, we would never dream of holding an esteemed person such as yourself as a prisoner. Everything you see here now and everything the Lai Dai group of companies has achieved can be traced to the seed you gave to the clan more than three hundred years ago, in the form of the inheritance you have given to our ancestors. Even now the Lai Dai group of companies is the only family-owned company among the mega-corporations of the state, free from the pressure and demands of public shareholders as the Lai Dai is not publicly listed on the market. As far as I am concerned, as the CEO of the Lai Dai group, the rest of the clan and I would be behind your wishes one hundred percent.” Gushes Mrs. Alakoni.

In awe and feeling some pride in her descendants and everything that they have achieved.

She’s happy as they have seemed to make something of themselves with the assets and cash that she has given them so long ago.

“Plus, I wouldn’t dare charge anything to you. Do you know every one of us is married in front of the tree you are buried in? The tree is very important to us, and every generation gets married in front of the tree as a witness to the union, with everyone of import and family member attending. To us, the tree is considered sacred and holy because it's related to you honored ancestor. You who is considered the progenitor of the clan and the mighty Lai Dai group of companies.” Said Mrs. Alakoni with passion.

She is now getting embarrassed from the high praise she is receiving and nervously rubs the back of her head, but her hand is blocked by the sombrero hat she is still wearing, so she removed her hat and shook her head to straighten out her leaves on her head.

“Amazing, I have heard of it from the scientists, but seeing it for myself makes a difference.” Said Mrs. Alakoni as she stretches her hand and touches her head feeling the smooth leaves.

“The fact that you are not human must never be widely known. Thankfully you have the presence of mind to disguise yourself, so not many people know that you are inhuman. With members of the science task group under house arrest, we will take measure to keep the information from spreading. Publically, it's not their business anyway and any knowledge regarding yourself we can make it as a company secret.” Said Mrs. Alakoni.

This tale has been pilfered from Royal Road. If found on Amazon, kindly file a report.

“How are you going to do that? I can’t wear this hat forever, and it's not like it's appropriate to wear my current outfit all the time.” She said with trepidation.

“Don’t you worry honored ancestor, I have an idea, though it will take time and some resources to implement. Tell me, have you heard the expression, to hide a tree you must put it in the forest?” Said Mrs. Alakoni with a grin.

“I have, what do you have in mind?” She said with a schooled expression.

“If you will allow me to scan your head with this Omni-tool. I can start in the design, manufacturing, and marketing of Lai Dai newest product. The Dryad leaves wig. We will market it and make sure it became fashionable enough that it will be popular in schools as a fashion statement. With some of our population wearing this, when the time comes for you to be seen in public eyes, no one will bat an eye as they will assume you to be a student wearing one of our product.” Said Mrs. Alakoni as her arm suddenly glowed and what looks like a holographic control panel appeared and solidified on her arm.

“Sounds devious..” She said as she stretches her hand at the glowing device on Mrs. Alakoni arm, the device scanned her head and sounded a ping of completion as the process finishes in a few seconds.

“Oh, are you interested in my Omni-tool? Just a minute…” Mrs. Alakoni said as she opened the drawer beside her and took out a device which looks like high-tech vambraces and stretches her hand offering it to her.

“This is a new 8th generation Orange Omni-tool that I have purchased for my daughter, it just came out today, and I was going to give it to her, but I suppose you need it more. I will purchase another one for her next time.” Said Mrs. Alakoni as she holds the device in front of her.

She accepted the device and attached the vambrace to her right arm, with the help of Mrs. Alakoni, she turned on the device, and the device glows with holographic control panel and display.

“An Omni-tool is a handheld device that combines a computer micro frame, sensor analysis pack, and a mini fabricator. It’s very versatile and reliable, Omni-tools are a multi-purpose diagnostic and manufacturing tools as well as computers used for a variety of civilian and battlefield tasks, such as hacking, decryption, or repair. I will help you register with this unit, use it well.” Explains Mrs. Alakoni as she helps fiddle with the setting and registering herself as the primary user and opens all the function to be available for her.

“Oh, so it’s like an apple smart-phone from my time?” She said in childlike wonder.

“Oh, you can’t compare an apple with an orange. Again, haven’t you heard the expression before? Apple is an ancient brand of computer and would have been obsolete nowadays if it comes out in the market today. No, this Omni-tool is manufactured by Orange, a subsidiary of one of the mega-corporation. Their product is the leading brand of Omni-tool in the market as I’ve said and there is legion of loyal customer for their product. There should be a long line of them today waiting for the chance to secure the same device you now wear on your arm.” Mrs. Alakoni said as she fiddled with her Omni-tool.

“Hmmm..” She nodded and let her do her work.

“There, you could use it now. Just type on the solid holo keyboard, it uses hard-light technology, so even though it looks incorporeal, you can touch it with no issue and would feel solid to you.” Said Mrs. Alakoni.

She marveled at the active and glowing device on her arms and played with it checking the available function on the menu displayed on a holographic screen.

“Just remember to charge it once a week, more often if you used it heavily.” Said Mrs. Alakoni as she nodded absent mindedly at Mrs. Alakoni words.

“Anyway while we wait for more people to adopt your look, you can go to the laboratory later for a more… sophisticated look compared to the mishmash you are wearing now. And while the Dryad wig project is ongoing, we can discuss what do you plan to do in the meanwhile, and there is the matter of arranging your bodyguards.” Said Mrs. Alakoni

She stopped fiddling with her new toy and shifted her attention entirely to Mrs. Alakoni.

“Hmm, I am not certain what I am going to do now. What do you recommend?” She said uncertainly.

“Well you can enroll in the school of applied knowledge, we are the majority investor in the school with 60% share, so arranging your enrollment would not be an issue. The School of Applied Knowledge focuses mainly on technical studies and is considered the best school for aspiring engineers. The school collaborates with many leading Caldari corporations, which benefits the school, the companies and not the least the students.” Explained Mrs. Alakoni

She imagined going back to school and interacting with the students every day while listening and practicing new things to learn and memorize. She considers but is still uncertain whether that is something that she want to do without knowing other options.

“Hmmm, can you give me time to consider before I can make a decision?” she said with some thoughtfulness on her face.

“That should be fine, but the matter of bodyguards should still be arranged no matter your decision on the school.” said Mrs. Alakoni while nodding.

“Umu.” She nodded and gave consent on the issue of bodyguards. She's a 4-foot tall girl with no power to speak of. Is it any wonder she would accept some bodyguards while traveling here and there?

“Splendid. I will make the call. Please wait here while I make the arrangement outside.” Said Mrs. Alakoni as she stands up and exits the office room, leaving her alone inside the office.

Finally alone, she used the chance to explore her Omni-tool more.

Seeing an app named Scope News, she tapped on it.

The holo display grows larger on her arm as it became a television screen with just the right size and an amazing full-colour resolution. There she can see a person serving as a reporter facing her just like a real television back in her time.

“...And now live from the street, we can see a long line of customers, some of which has waited in line for days just to get the new 8th generation Orange omni-tool which has just been released today. We are now speaking with the person who has the honor of receiving the first ever product available to the public from the Orange store and has also received store vouchers for all his effort. And get these folks, this person has queued for days naked under the freezing condition and has gotten not one but two Omni-tools which he has worn on both arms. We will now speak with this person to know more.” Said a young looking woman who happens to be the reporter for Scope News. The camera then shifted towards a buff and naked looking man, with teal colored hair and strangely appropriate orange colored eyes, and on his buff and chiseled chest are tattooed a large full colored orange fruit.

“Hello there sir, may I know your name?” Asked the young woman journalist to the naked man.

“Hello there! Yes! My name is Jeremiah Gottwald! 29 Years old, blood type A, status single and my sign is Leo!” Exclaimed the naked man loudly.

“Wonderful sir! May we ask what makes you decide to wait in line naked and for days for the new 8th Gen Orange Omni-tool? You even go so far as tattooing your chest with the company logo.” asked the young woman journalist.

“Yes! My goal is to promote the company, who produces this amazing product! If I can get on the news with what I have done, then it's a small price to pay! The Orange tattoo on my chest is the mark of my loyalty! Being naked under this blizzard is nothing compared to the storm of my loyalty! ALL HAIL ORANGE!” Exclaimed Jeremiah Gottwald naked and raised both arms to show off both 8th Gen Orange omni-tool attached.

“... And there we have it from a loyal fan of Orange! Let’s get back to you in the studio!” said the young woman reporter while looking at the screen.

The screen then switches to the Scope studio with a middle-aged man as the newscaster staring straight ahead with a serious expression.

“Ahem! There we have it live from the official opening of the new Orange 8th Gen Omni-tool which is available starting today, looks like the company can again express another profit this year with loyal customers like Mr. Jeremiah Gottwald there. Next, we will cover the coronation of Empress Jamyl Sarum the 1st from the Dwarven Amarr Empire, and her proclamation from her Abaddon class battleship as the proceeding is underway. Can we see the recording of her proclamation again?” Said the newscaster as the screen behind him showing the recording from the Amarr Certified News of the event.

The screen then changed to a recording of a regal looking female dwarf, wearing a royal gown, looking stern, dignified and beautiful as she stands on the podium looking straight ahead and starts proclaiming.

“I... am the harbinger of hope. I am the sword of the righteous… And to all who hear my words, I say this! What you give to this empire. I shall give back unto you.” Said the dwarven woman who identified herself as Empress Jamyl Sarum the 1st.

The screen then changed back to the newscaster man still looking serious and straight ahead.

“Now everyone who has heard the new empress proclamation are wondering what does this mean for the whole galaxy as some has been reporting that the empire is declaring a new reclamation. Especially considering the fact that the new empress with her Abaddon class battleship has single-handedly destroyed a whole elder fleet belonging to another separate faction of the Orc’s Minmatar Republic with a new, never before seen, Amarr super weapon. Speculation has been rife that…” Said the newscaster before she cuts him off by closing the control panel of her Omni-tool as she could see that Mrs. Alakoni is back from outside the office.

“Alright, the arrangement for your bodyguards is complete. They will arrive here tomorrow, and I will be there with you and introduce you to each other as well.” Said Mrs. Alakoni while walking closer towards her.

“Umu, thank you Mrs. Alakoni for everything.” She said bashfully to Mrs. Alakoni.

“It’s my pleasure, honored ancestor. Ah, one more thing before we leave for the laboratory. In public, it's not like I can refer to yourself as honored ancestor. And we need to register yourself in our database, and for that, I need to give you an ID name so we can recognize you whenever you are in our company network. What name would suit you? Maybe Mithril? As you are as precious and beautiful as one?” Enquired Mrs. Alakoni.

“Mithril? Can I be registered as Being Y instead?” She said with a thoughtful expression.

“I don’t mind since it's your decision, but why being Y?” Asked Mrs. Alakoni.

“Well, since I don’t know what I am, I think being called a being is appropriate. And since I look like part of a plant,  I think the letter Y is appropriate because just as a seed sprouted and grow into a tree, it first started as a sprout, which resembles the letter Y. So I think the name would suit me, plus it doesn’t say whether I am a male or female so it would be harder for people to guess my identity.” She explained.

“It is as good a reason as any other, honored ancestor. Let me register it within the company database.” said Mrs. Alakoni as she opens the control panel of her Omni-tool and starts typing into her database.

“Done, I have ranked the ID name as a VIP within our network, and our people will address themselves appropriately when you need assistance. Now I will make a separate ID. This one would be for your everyday name and usage during your travel. We will make sure that this ID is not linked to Lai Dai, as this ID will be registered inside the State network and available for everyone. What name would you want this one to be?” Asked Mrs. Alakoni as she continues typing on her Omni-tool.

“I have already decided my name to be Raine.” She answers Mrs. Alakoni.

“Alright, any family name? Or do you want to use your old family name?” Asked Mrs. Alakoni.

“Hmm, no I don’t want to use the old family name, lease just put it down as Sioux as it is close enough and it sounds more modern.” She answered Mrs. Alakoni.

“Alright, so your full name would be Raine Sioux. Can you confirm that? And what age would you be?” Said Mrs. Alakoni.

“Hmm, put me down as nine years old.” She nodded, confirming the name selection as she answers.

“Alright, I will save this inside the State database, your age is nine, and I have taken the liberty of classifying yourself as an orphan being funded under State stipend. This stipend is fair and will still make you independent from the influence of any mega-corporation, at least until the stipend expires when you reach the legal age of 17 under State law.” Explained Mrs. Alakoni as she finally finishes typing into her Omni-tool and closes its panel.

“Now that everything is done and over with I hope you will forgive me for addressing you as either Raine or Sioux from now on while under the public eyes, honored ancestor.” Said Mrs. Alakoni as she bowed towards me.

“Yes, it's fine with me. Thank you, Mrs. Alakoni.” She said politely.

“And even though it’s not relevant to us now, I would like to inform you of our unofficial clan motto and what every clan member has adopted.” Said Mrs. Alakoni.

“Umu, alright what is the clan motto?” She asked with curiosity.

“ It’s, we are Lai Dai! Come and die!” Answered Mrs. Alakoni with mirth.

“... why is that the motto?” She asked with confusion.

“Well there is a bit of wordplay as the word ‘lai’ in Chinese means ‘come’ and the word ‘dai’, when spoken, can be taken as ‘die'. So essentially we are saying to our enemies who we are and that we are asking them to come at us and die under our might. Though the interesting part is that we can use it in the event of defeat, by saying that we are willing to come and die fighting our enemies.” Answered Mrs. Alakoni with a smile.

“That is witty and morbid. I like it.” She said with approval.

“I am glad that our honored ancestor thinks so as well.” Said Mrs. Alakoni with a smile.

“But enough about fun facts, let's go to the laboratory now, I am sure they can whip up something for you to wear instead of that horrid thing you are wearing now.” Said Mrs. Alakoni as she gently lifted Raine's small body from the chair to the ground.

Next, Mrs. Alakoni took the sombrero hat from the top of the desk and making sure all the leaves are inside it, then tied it securely.

After that Mrs. Alakoni offered one hand facing upward for guidance to the laboratory.

As she took Mrs. Alakoni hand, she was glad that everything turns out alright.

Compared to the bleak future being presented at the end of the previous chapter of her life, this is much better.

Now she is simply excited about where would future chapters of her life will take her.
