chapters.name: Chapter 5
chapters.content:
After leaving the director’s office, both Raine and Alakoni are subjected to curious glances from the surrounding personnel of the facility. In the subordinates’ mind, they find it unusual that they would see the highest authority within the company spending time babysitting a minor during working hours.

Nevertheless, both Alakoni and Raine disregarded the stares and continued forward along the hallway on their way to the laboratory. Both of them have already passed multiple checkpoints and offices on their way to the lab, and finally, they could see an entrance with the laboratory sign above it, flanked by a pair of guards.

Alakoni nodded slightly at the guards, with Raine following behind as both of them passed through the entrance to the laboratory.

Inside they can see many scientists and their assistants working on a variety of scientific instruments, the purpose of which are not clear to Raine.

Alakoni then lets Raine’s hand go, and then approaches one of the more senior looking scientist around, leaving behind Raine who is marveling at the equipment and computers around her.

The scientist that Alakoni is approaching looks to be around 40s, with curly red hair, a pair of glasses, wearing the same white lab coat like the one adorning Raine currently, a pair of black boots and wearing a pair of purple gloves.

The same scientist looked up from his data pad as the director approaches him.

“Greetings Professor Dexter, I am the director of Lai Dai group, my name is Alakoni Ishanoya. I trust you have already been informed of myself coming for a visit and the purpose of said visit?” Explained director Alakoni.

“Yes, I have been updated director Alakoni. And the girl behind you must be the fascinating guest who have stalemated some of my work. No offense though director, our security personnel could use some work if they are not able to resolve the emergency quickly, and maybe next time I would have the pleasure of working in peace.” Said Professor Dexter lightheartedly at Alakoni as he smiled kindly at Raine.

“Indeed professor. The matter of retraining our security personnel notwithstanding. I hope you don’t mind spending some time and effort to outfit our recalcitrant guest with some of our more properly… advanced equipment?” Asked Alakoni quietly.

“Certainly, now if the young lady can make herself available here with us we can proceed.” Said professor Dexter as he nodded and placed his datapad on the nearby desk.

However, interrupting both of the professor and the director’s conversations, an explosion suddenly rings out and shocked both of them and the next thing they know the emergency sirens activated and loudly broadcasted throughout the laboratory. The alarm is followed by scores of hovering drones flying over above their heads toward the burning engine on an open testing ground, and then the drones start to douse it with synthetic foams.

“My lab!” Shouted professor Dexter in panic.

Both the professor and the director turned their attention to Raine only to find her frozen with her finger on a glowing big red button, which is on a computer panel near her.

Raine freezes having been caught in the act, with a deer in the headlights expression on her face.

“I was curious. Sorry...” Raine said remorsefully.

“Sigh, I really should have learned to label the self-destruct button and cover them with a glass panel. The nightmare with my sister is happening all over again.” Lamented professor Dexter as he took off his glasses and pinched his nose above the eyes.

As guards and personnel stream in from outside the laboratory trying to salvage the situation and save as much data and equipment as possible.

“I am sorry about her action professor. Perhaps this is not the best time for a visit. We will be back again in the future. “ Said the director as she picked up Raine and exited the laboratory hurriedly.

Outside the laboratory, besides the entrance door, Alakoni put Raine back on the ground as the older woman shakes her head at the destruction and the cost that this will reflect on this month’s balance sheet.

“Sorry…” Raine apologized again.

“Ah, it’s fine we managed to identify another safety risk with this, so it’s not like it’s a total loss.” Said Alakoni while trying to smile at Raine and failing.

“Although, now that the professor will be pre-occupied for a while. I am at a loss on how we can outfit you now.” Said Alakoni as she looks around for a solution.

“I can help you with that director.” Said a voice out of thin air near both Alakoni and Raine.

Both Alakoni and Raine looks around but are unable to spot anyone nearby, Alakoni then sighed.

“Mrs. Ashi, how many times have I told you not to wear the Light Frame Scout Dropsuit with the cloaking field active?” Said Alakoni with exasperation.

“20 times now, but who’s counting?” A voice said as the figure materializes in front of them, wearing a silver-coloured full body, form fitting cybernetic armor with a full reflective faceplate. A handgun holstered on her right leg and a short sword sheathed on her left leg.

“Ms. Raine, let me introduce you to Mrs. Ashi, she is the bodyguard and also wife of our private security contractor.” Explained director Alakani.

“Please director Alakoni, call me Ashi. My husband and I are not much for formalities between friends.” Said Ashi, her voice clear even though her face is covered by the faceplate helmet she is wearing.

“I’ll keep that in mind Mrs. Ashi. Although what is this about something that you can help with my charge here.” Said Alakoni as she gestured towards Raine’s direction.

“If she does not mind I have a spare undersuit she could wear inside my husband's office and I. It's the advanced version with enhanced profile dampening, and it’s even breathable! Plus I have a couple of ideas that I think would be perfect for her. Teehee” Said Ashi with some glee at the end.

“Why not, it’s not like she can wear anything worse. You can go ahead Mrs. Ashi. I know the way to your office, and I can follow behind you.” Alakoni said as she gestured towards the direction of Ashi’s office.

“Wonderful, I’ll see you there then. Toodles.” Ashi said while waving her hand as she jumped back while doing a 360 degrees flip and engaged her cloaking field as she was about to reach the ground.

“Oh, I forgot to mention that she is also a ninja.” Alakoni said as an afterthought.

Raine’s eye sparkles with admiration as she saw how cool Mrs. Ashi was, now she cannot wait to reach her office. She starts pulling on Alakoni’s sweater so they can reach Mrs. Ashi’s office faster. As they walked ahead, they found themselves in front of a traditional looking office with old Japanese stone lantern and artificial pond with koi fishes swimming in front of the office entrance.

“Excuse me.” Said Alakoni as she slides the traditional door sideways and enters the office.

Raine rushes past Alakoni and looks for Mrs. Ashi but instead found a Japanese looking man sitting on the floor drinking hot tea from a cup with a pot of said tea beside him. The man was wearing a white robe and white leggings with gray combat boots, and his hair is also tied in a ponytail just like Alakoni.

“Welcome to my humble abode director Alakoni. How may I help you today? I am afraid my dear wife just went past me without explaining anything to me. But where are my manners? Please.. Sit down and have a cup of tea with me.” Said the man with a calm and pleasant tone as he put down his cup of tea and starts preparing tea for two more people.

“As always it is a pleasure, Mr. Jack.” (Editor Note: Ayy, Samurai Jack) Said Alakoni as she enters Jack’s office and sits cross legged on the floor opposite him.

“Ms. Raine, please come and sit together with us. Please introduce yourself as well.” Alakoni said as she gestured towards an empty spot beside her.

Raine obediently follows Alakoni request and sits in a proper seiza beside Alakoni as she recognizes the ancient tea pouring ceremony from the far east.

“Good day Jack-san, my name is Raine. I am pleased to make your acquaintance.” Said, Raine, as she bowed her head until it touched the floor in front of her and raised her head again with back ramrod straight as she stares ahead toward Jack.

Jack stops making the tea for a moment and then moved again as he continues pouring the matcha or green tea powders into the cup, took a ladle of hot water from the pot and pour it into the cup as he whisked it firmly with one hand, while the other is holding the cup.

Jack then passed the steaming cup of hot tea to Alakoni.

Alakoni accepted the cup of hot tea while looking beside her with curiosity at Raine’s sitting position and mannerism.

“What a charming girl you are, I was sure that there are no more people in today’s day and age, that have the knowledge of the ancient art of tea-making ceremony customs. And Raine, such a precious name, just like rain (Editor Note: Puns, lol), I have never felt natural rain again beside the showers. Your name also reminded me of the blooms of the flower and the scent of wet plants after the rain has passed. Yes, it is a good name.” Said, Jack, as he starts preparing another cup of tea for Raine.

“Nope, I am sure I am but a novice compared to you Jack-san. But perhaps if you will permit me to make a cup of tea for you?” Said, Raine, as she outstretches her hands as if requesting the tools to make the tea.

“I suppose I can let you try Raine-chan, I would love to drink the tea made by you.” Jack said with a smile as he passes the whisk, the ladle, the long spoon for the matcha powder and the empty cup to Raine’s outstretched hands.
To Jack’s surprise, Raine arranges the tools correctly according to custom. The tools arranged perfectly beside her as Raine sits in proper seiza position. Every movement is smooth and done in one continuous motion, flowing from one step to the other without pause or hesitation. From the position of the empty cup in front of her, the pose she has adopted while pouring the matcha powder, the pouring of hot water and to the whisking of the matcha until it is ready. Raine then passes the completed hot matcha tea to Jack’s hand.

As Jack stares at the cup of tea in his hands, Raine proceeds to close the ceremony by cleaning the tools and drying them with a piece of cloth and arranging them appropriately for the next person to use. Jack then took a sip of the tea and marvels at the texture, the taste and the temperature of the tea, for it is a tea made by a master.

“You have the skills of a master, Raine-chan. Tell me, how did you manage to make this tea and who teaches you how to do it?” Jack asked with wonder and delight.

Raine then puts both hands on the floor in front of her as she bows at Jack, and then she lifted her arm and proceed to remove the sombrero hat still on her head.

As her leaves became free from its containment inside the hat, Jack was looking in even more wonder at Raine.

“I have no master, as I have learned the knowledge myself through observation and participation Jack-san. I have lived for two hundred years already, and that was three hundred years ago, I may have some tricks up my sleeves because of that.” Raine answers as she sits still in seiza position.

“I see. I thank you for the tea you have made for me. It has been so long since someone else has shared their tea with me.” Jack said as he put both his hand in front of him and bowed slightly, an action mirrored by Raine.

Raine and Jack then close their eyes and sit in seiza position facing each other without saying anything else.

As the silence continues, the forgotten Alakoni beside Raine awkwardly raised her hand in confusion.

“What just happened?” Asked Alakoni, bewildered.

“Director, now it is a time of peace and reflection. Please, wait while I meditate together with Raine-chan.” Said Jack serenely.

“Peace Mrs. Alakoni, we will meditate until Mrs. Ashi returns to us.” Said Raine with serenity.

After 10 minutes have passed in silence, the sound of footsteps descending on staircases can be heard from where everyone has gathered.

Alakoni, Raine, and Jack stir and looks toward the direction the sound is coming from but failed to see anyone until a figure suddenly materializes and hugged Jack tightly from behind.

“Jack! Husband, did you enjoy having my little kitty cat here as a guest?” Said Ashi as she rubbed her faceplate against Jack’s face repeatedly.

“Ashi! Please, not in front of our guests!” Said, Jack, as his face gets redder and redder in embarrassment.

“Again, you’re such a prude dear husband. It’s fine there are only friends here.” Said Ashi as she takes off her helmet and shakes off her hairs, which are black and of short length.

Ashi looks beautiful, and to Raine’s surprise, she looks like she has a pure Japanese ancestry as well, the same ancestry as Jack.

Raine then shifted her attention towards Alakoni, with an expression looking for an explanation.

“I did say that purebloods are a rarity, but the pairings of Mr. Jack and Mrs. Ashi is considered very rare and should they have children, their children would also be considered as purebloods.” Explained Alakoni as she sipped her hot tea.

“I am still waiting for that child, by the way, husband.” Said Ashi with annoyance.

Jack then put one of his hand under his chin, and with a thoughtful expression, he then shifted his attention towards Raine then at Ashi before finally nodding his head.

“I suppose you have waited long enough Ashi. I am open to have that child now after seeing Raine-chan. For some reason, the thought of having someone like Raine-chan of my own to spoil and teach is something that became very appealing to me now.” Said Jack with conviction.

Ashi then squeals and proceed to shower Jack’s face with kisses and hugs.

“Oh, kitty-chan! I cannot thank you enough for convincing my husband for a child! I love you even more now! I promise you can even be one of the godparents when we have the child!” Said Ashi as she switched target and latched to Raine, to Raine’s fear and horror.

Raine is lifted from her seiza position by Ashi, and her cheeks are rubbed by Ashi’s cheeks until she can feel them getting redder and tender.

“Uuuuu, let go of me woman! Also, my name is not kitty!” Complained Raine while trying to escape from Ashi’s grasp.

“Uhuhuhu, not yet you aren’t. Let’s give you the reason why you are here in the first place.” Said Ashi as she let go of Raine and took out from her inventory a black colored, skin tight undersuit.

“Tadaaaa! As promised, Raine chan's new outfit! Now let’s get rid of all the junks you are wearing now!” Said Ashi as she approaches Raine slowly like a predator stalking her prey.

Raine started to back up slowly and was going to run, but she was too slow compared to Ashi’s reaction speed. Ashi then starts stripping her Omni-tool, clothing, gloves, and boots until she’s stark naked on the ground.

“Noooooo!” Raine screamed with mortification as she laid on the floor while trying to cover her exposed privates.

During the commotion, Alakoni and Jack retreated to the second floor as they left the pair together to their own devices.

“Hold still will you!” Ashi said as she grappled with Raine, trying to force her to wear the suit.

Raine resisted, but was no match for Ashi’s strength, until finally, Raine was wearing the black skin tight, turtle necked undersuit, which is covering her from her neck to the tips of her fingers and toes.

Ashi then forces Raine to wear the black colored reinforced combat boots and the black colored reinforced combat gauntlets. And as is the standard for the equipment Raine has encountered now, all of them adjusted their size to fit her perfectly.

Ashi then attached back Raine’s Omni-tool and secured it on Raine’s right arm.

Finally, Ashi covered Raine’s head with something that looks like a ninja mask made from the same material as her undersuit. Ashi is also making sure that all her leaves are inside the material, which is thankfully breathable as she breathes from her leaves, thank you!

Now Raine looks like a scuba diver, with some part of her face and eyes the only thing left uncovered from her whole body.

“And now the finishing pieces!” Said Ashi as she raised a black cat ears hairband from her inventory.

Raine took one look at the black cat ears hairband and shook her head rapidly, rejecting it.

“Aw come on Kitty-chan. I’ll give you this black cat tail belt as well if you wear it for me?” Said Ashi with a pleading voice and a puppy dog eyes with fake tears streaming down as she dropped to one knee with one hand in a begging position under her chin and the other hand holding the belt with an actual black cat tail attached to it.

Raine takes another look at both the black cat ears hairband and the black cat tail belt, then proceeds to give Ashi an unimpressed stare.

“Oh, it's a shame if you refuse. You see, inside the tail are hidden multiple discs of high explosives. See for yourself.” Said Ashi while pointing at the source of the tail where there is an opening. Ashi inserted her hand and took out a disc with a button on top, as she presses it the disc starts beeping rapidly before she quickly presses the button again.

“You see the explosive discs are stacked on top of each other inside the tail. The tail itself is made from a durable and fire-proof material as a precaution against the explosives. The belt itself also has some pockets lining its side for you to keep anything small put inside, as well as a couple of slots for knives. How is it? If you keep wearing the cat hairband all the time, I will continue supplying you with the explosive discs for free!” Said Ashi while she dangled the tail in front of Raine’s eyes.

Raine psyche is conflicted between the humiliation of wearing the black cat ears hairband and the pull of her need to see something explode.

In the end, her manly psyche wins out and forces her to accept the deal.

Plus Ashi said that she would replenish the discs every time she sees Ashi again.

Raine thinks that this will also ensure her to visit both Ashi and Jack more often. Something that both Ashi and Jack seems to look forward to.

However, as the decision was already made, she nodded and took both the black cat ears hairband and the black cat tail/explosives belt from Ashi’s hand.

With forced grumpiness, she wore the black cat ears hair band on her head and next, with genuine cheerfulness she wore the black cat tail belt as she stroked it lovingly.

“Click!”

The sound of a camera from Ashi’s Omni-tool sounded as she pointed her Omni-tool at Raine and forever immortalized the moment she lovingly stroked her cat tail.

“Oh, how adorable! You look just like an actual kitty cat!” Gushes Ashi as she rubbed her cheeks again against Raine’s cheeks.

Now Raine looks like a demi-human of the black cat species if there are such a thing as a beast people anywhere in this universe.

With the full body change from the top of her head to the tip of her toes, her skin tight black undersuit, her black reinforced combat boots, her black reinforced combat gauntlet, her black cat ears hairband and finally her black cat tail belt.

Raine just stands there silently enduring the humiliation looking both adorable and deadly at the same time.

After a while of Ashi’s petting session, to Raine’s relief, she can hear the sound of Alakoni and Jack coming back from upstairs.

As Alakoni and Jack approach closer, Jack tried hard to hold his laugh while Alakoni laughed hard without holding back at Raine’s new outfit.

“Amazing, she looks both adorable and deadly at the same time! I couldn’t have picked a better outfit for her!” Said Alakoni with admiration after she finishes laughing at Raine’s expense.

“You have done well Ashi. She is very. As you say, cute.” Said, Jack, as he holds his laugh.

Raine pouted and puffed her cheek angrily as she sits cross-legged and turns her body, so it turns around and facing away from all three of them.

“Oh, don’t be like that Raine. I know what will cheer you up! Jack and I have discussed a matter related to you upstairs, and we have decided to give you a weapon to protect yourself. We will be there with you as well as the bodyguards who will be arriving tomorrow, but we have decided it’s always good if you can fend for yourself if need be.” Said Alakoni good-naturedly.

“With that said, it is my honor to present you with this blade. It belongs to me, but I have confidence that you will be able to use it well.” Said, Jack, as he took out a blade and offered it to Raine.

Raine accepted the offered blade and marveled at the dark metal coating and the honed edge. As she inspected her new blade, the grip looks high tech and is heavier than expected.

“That is an Advanced Nova Knife, specifically the ‘Blackprey’ ZN-28 Nova Knife. To explain it to you Nova Knives are a close-quarters melee weapon. The Nova Knife is as deadly a weapon as anything on the battlefield. Its name derives from the heated plasma edge of the blade formed by a thermic igniter and linear gravity condenser  that, in skilled hands, can be used to carve through even the thickest drop suit armor.” Explained Jack as he observes Raine inspecting her new weapon.

Raine, satisfied with examining her new weapon, proceeds to sheathe her new blade on the available slot on her belt’s left side so she can use it when she needs it.

“That is the most advanced Nova Knife you can get in the market, with a damage output almost double compared to the standard Nova Knives available in the market. The only thing more advanced than a ‘Blackprey’ Nova Knives are the Nova Knives used exclusively by Ishukone corporation operatives, and even those are only 33% more powerful compared to the ‘Blackprey’ Nova Knife.” Said Jack further clarifying the capabilities of the enhanced knife he has gifted to Raine.

“As an addition, as a personal gift from me. I wish to pass to you something which belonged to me and has a deep history for myself.” Said Ashi as she stood beside Jack and offered what looks like an onna-men mask from a traditional Japanese Noh play.

On Ashi’s hand lies a white mask with a feminine expression and a small and light red lipstick where the lips are supposed to be.

“Ashi, that mask!” Exclaimed Jack as he looks worriedly at his wife.

“No, Jack. I am ready to let go of the past. This part of myself must go, and I cannot imagine a better person to pass this to other than Raine-chan.” Said Ashi with serenity.

Raine accepted the mask from Ashi, and she can feel that the mask is no ordinary mask as her hands shuddered when she touched it.

“The mask is enchanted through a process that I have no knowledge of. What I know is that the mask will somehow increase your speed by another 50 percent and increases your stamina regeneration to twice compared to normal. I entrusted this mask to you, together with the knife from Jack, I hope you can use the mask and the blade well.” Said Ashi with faith.

Jack still looks worriedly at his wife but look resolved to stand by her decision.

Raine, still holding the mask on her hands decided not to wear it over her face but decided to secure it on top of her head.

So a part of her face is still uncovered, and with her nose and mouth covered by the ninja mask, she looks like a mini hunter-ninja from the anime Naruto franchise.

“I humbly thank both of you for the hospitality.” Said, Raine, as she bowed deeply once more.

“I humbly thank you for the tea.” Said Jack.

“I humbly thank you for the cognizance.” Said Ashi.

“Well, I am just going to give a standard thank you.” Said Alakoni.

Both Ashi and Jack returns the bow and back to standing side by side after completing the bow.

Both Alakoni and Raine then said their goodbyes as both of them left Ashi and Jack’s office.

Inside Ashi and Jack’s office, both Ashi and Jack are discussing their plan.

“So.. about your promise?” Asked Ashi with a nervous undertone.

Jack smiled and kissed Ashi full on the lips, which Ashi returned.

“Of course, dear Ashi. And I apologize for taking this long to decide.” Said, Jack, as he stroked Ashi’s cheek and as both their forehead touching each other.

“Oh, husband.” Said Ashi as she happily snuggled Jack back.

Jack then separates himself from Ashi, and then he bent down to pick up Raine’s previous outfit. Raine’s sombrero hat, white lab coat, rubber gloves and rubber boots from the floor.

“What do you want to do with Raine chan's old things, Ashi?” Asked Jack.

“Hmmm, I will burn the hat, use the rubber gloves and boots for housecleaning. And the white lab coat. I have something special in mind, so I will wash it and wear it so we can play doctor.” Said Ashi happily.

Jack looks blankly at Ashi as he nervously rubbed the back of his head.

“Forgive me Ashi. I do not quite understand the last part. Can you explain it to me?” Asked Jack with confusion lining his face.

“I will repeat what I said, husband. You are such a prude.” Said Ashi annoyedly while rolling her eyes.

Moving forward to outside Ashi and Jack’s office, both Alakoni and Raine are walking without a clear destination as everyone they have passed now draw not a curious gaze but a shocked one instead, while lingering on Raine after the initial look.

Unknown to both of them since then, there would be rumors on the corporation grapevines which states that director Alakoni has created and funded a project with the goal of transforming children's into a perfect weapon of war.

Years later, this rumor would continue to persist and even started numerous copycat projects from the other Caldari mega-corporation and pirate groups.

“Now that you are outfitted worthy of your stature Ms. Raine, would you like to retire and rest? A guest room is ready for your stay and should you need anything I can have a maid available for you.” Offered Alakoni.

“Thank you for the offer Mrs. Alakoni, but I would like to return to my tree and rest there. I feel that I would feel more comfortable resting there.” Answered Raine.

“Very well Ms. Raine, it’s a long way back to your tree from here, but we can go there now. If you would please follow me.” Confirmed Alakoni.

“Talking about Mr. Jack, how could he have married a ninja as his wife in the first place?” Asked Raine with curiosity.

“Mr. Jack claims that when he was a samurai, both Mrs. Ashi and he are involved in some dispute. A dispute which they have since resolved.” Explained Alakoni.

Raine giggled hearing Alakoni’s answer.

“What is funny, Mrs. Raine?” Queried Alakoni.

“Oh, a samurai and a shinobi marrying each other? It was nothing, just an old joke.” Said Raine with a smile.

“If you say so Ms. Raine.” Said Alakoni with a nod.

Both Alakoni and Raine then proceed forward, passing through offices and checkpoints and still along the way they would be under stares from everyone they passed.

Until finally, they reached the entrance to Raine’s tree, director Alakoni then authorized herself and Raine after talking to the pair of guards by the entrance to be cleared entry into the secure cavern.

As Alakoni and Raine enter the large cavern, both of them could already see the entirety of the large tree, glowing somehow, even from a considerable distance from the entrance, which is behind them.

“So... I am finally back to where I first started..” Said, Raine, as she gazes longingly at her tree.

“Indeed, Ms. Raine. How does it make you feel?” Asked Alakoni as she stares at the same tree beside Raine.

However, before Raine could answer, both Alakoni and Raine are distracted by someone’s exclamation from a distance.

And as they looked ahead, both of them can see the middle-aged scientist woman who Raine first met when she first woke up and were wrongly convicted of her escape, fast approaching them looking murderous at both of them.

“I feel that some things stay the same Mrs. Alakoni.” Answered Raine with some mirth.

chapters.content:
It is said that at the end of one’s rope, one should make a knot and hang on for dear life… Those are wise words and should be heeded but unfortunately some resorts to alcohol at the end of their rope, which left only one hand holding the rope as they drink from the liquid of doom.

As more drinks are being consumed, the weaker one’s grip became until their grip on reality became lost and their demise are hastened and ensured.

Alcohol is an insidious poison for being safe to consume and for the creeping negative health ramification stalking the body until alcohol addiction already rooted firmly in the mind, but above all the most potent poison is for changing the mind into a beast without reason, further isolating them from help provided by those who cared until they can no longer care anymore.

One should really wonder, if one’s true self can be seen in their action in the face of dire situation… Then what does depending on alcohol say about them? Perhaps a coward? Perhaps one without support from friends or family? Salvation from the demons haunting their memories?

Whatever it is, Raine has already seen the effect of abusing alcohol when taken in excess and the lucky ones are taken care and watched over by friends and families, the unlucky ones gain an alcohol addiction and their life spirals into a miserable existence and ended in a long time of pain because of liver failures on the streets or on the hospital bed.

Even the stupid and relatively painless end like a graduate student who drink tainted alcohol and jump off from their hotel room because they thought they can fly, still leaves behind shattered and broken hearts of their friends and families.

Knowing this, then why does Raine continued walking towards a bar to get some alcoholic drinks? She knows what it can do, even though she thought she know better in her head, her troubled heart still insisted over her head and thus she walk in a mixture of self-loathing and the need to be carefree once more.

“Why are you brooding Raine? We are going to a bar not a funeral, lighten up or as seniors we will also become troubled.” Said N-007 from the front as she turns her head towards Raine while walking forward towards their destination.

While still walking, Raine touched both her index fingers together, the elder Yggdrasil branch still held in one of her grip. Raine then mumbles despondently to N-007 query, not really answering N-007’s question.

“Come out of it N-007. Didn’t we hate alcohol before we transcend from humanity?” Said M-007 nonchalantly beside Raine.

“Oh, I forget about that! To be fair, it has been like… Forever since we first arrived in the citadel.” Said M-014 walking beside Raine

“Speak for yourself granny, if you aren’t so scatter brained you would have still remembered the fact about your own life as well.” Said M-007 with some venom to her words.

“What! We are almost the same age! Who are you to call me a granny? If I am, then you are as well!” Exclaimed M-014 with indignation.

“Stow it you two, we’re here!” Said N-007 sternly as she pointed towards the Purgatory Bar entrance in front of their group.

Raine follows the direction N-007 index finger is pointing at and looks at the bar entrance. There are already a long line of people like her queuing in order to gain entry into the bar.

However, Raine’s attention and eyebrows are raised as high as they can, as she sees the bouncer for the Purgatory Bar is a she-hulking version of herself. At 6 feet 8 inches or 203 cm or close to 2 metres tall, said version of her can only be considered as a powerhouse or a brute wearing a yellow sleeveless midriff, a blue denim shorts, a pair of sunglasses, and a massive pairs of breasts. The she-hulk appearances screams bouncer you do not want to mess with. Raine discreetly hides behind N-007’s back the moment she saw such an imposing figure.

N-007 though, approaches the she-hulk nonchalantly and greets her amicably, with Raine hiding behind N-007’s back.

“Yo! Big sister! Good to see business are peaking up. How are things around here?” Said N-007  good-naturedly as she raised a hand in greeting.

“Ah little sister! Things are good, we are getting busy since we just got ourselves a fresh batch of great dragon blood. One of our younger member just slayed the last great dragon in her universe. It should be a good batch since the dragon is ancient enough and powerful enough to earn a name. What was it again? Oh yeah the dragon’s name is Smaug, the one that slays it said he is a smug bastard.” Said the she-hulk version of Raine with maybe a G-cup breast, G for Gigantic that is.

“Badum Tish!” Said M-014 with relish.

Everyone then stares at M-014 with a questioning gaze after she interrupted the flow of conversation.

“What? She was asking for it!” Said M-014 with consternation.

“Why do I even bother partnering with you I would never understand..” Said M-007 with a sigh.

“Anyway, are you here for business or pleasure little sister?” Said the she-hulking version of Raine.

“A bit of both actually, this sapling here is actually my first charge as a Guardian and she is bit drained from the naturalization process. It’s actually quite fortunate that the bar is able to procure itself some great dragon blood as I think C-137 here needs it more than we do.” Said N-007 with some relief as she pushes Raine from behind her back and into the she-hulk’s under cleavage.

“You don’t say? Where is the sapling though? I don’t see anyone like that around.” Said the G cup version of Raine as she swivels around looking for anyone fitting the description of a sapling around the entrance to the bar.

Raine’s head has become stuck in-between the she-hulk’s cleavage, instead of fat, Raine is certain the she-hulk’s breasts consist of 75 percent solid muscle and is packing such strength that Raine’s body is also lifted from the ground. Unfortunately, as the she-hulk swivel her head and body looking for her, so does Raine’s small and light body. Raine is starting to get a neck pain from the movement so admits defeats and cried out.

“Nyaaaa! It hurts…” Cried Raine pitifully.

“Ohhh, there you are! How cute! I never seen such a cute little cat sapling before. You’re so cute I can just gobble you up!” Gushes the she-hulk as she spread apart her breasts, therefore exposing and releasing the vulnerable Raine within, and as Raine fell to the ground, she makes sure to hide her face behind the mask given by Mrs. Ashi.

Raine then suffered the indignity of being petted, hugged, stroked and smothered by the she-hulk’s affection.

“Ahhh, it’s been awhile since I have seen another small sapling! They grow up so fast! Who’s the cute one? Yes you are, yes you are! Let big sister Q-001 take care of you alright?” Said Q-001 with heart-filled eyes and a wide grin as she rubbed cheeks with Raine’s mask while Q-001 arms and breasts are holding Raine’s suspended body midair.

“Big sis, so can we go in without queuing? Come on, do it as a favour for me please?” Pleaded N-007 distracting Q-001 from her pleasure session.

“Oh, sure, come on in. Now now kitty, don’t fuss. Remember big sister Q-001 every time you come to the citadel ok? I’ll be right here waiting in the bar for you. Give me a kiss and I’ll throw in a glass of bloody mary for you.” Cooed Q-001 with a satisfied voice as she released Raine to the ground and waved Raine’s group into the Purgatory Bar to the groans of the group still lining in queue.

“Thanks sis! Now let’s enjoy ourselves shall we?” Said N-007 as she walks leading the way into the Purgatory Bar bringing Raine and her subordinates in with her.

Inside the bar, Raine can see the typical dimmed environment with all the typical things that should be in a bar. Freezing cold environment, bright lights from the advertisements, the beat of techno music, the drink bar with the bartenders and stools, the dancing pole with naked versions of her pole-dancing…

“That doesn’t look right…” Said Raine with a pale face behind her mask as she stares at the gyrating naked forms dancing on the pole, moving with great dexterity and grace.

“Now C-137, you cannot discriminate on other’s choice of profession. Those girls choose a profession with great need for agility and dexterity, this is one method to train those stats. Some are choosing to train with bikinis and skirts instead see.” Admonished M-007 behind Raine as she pointed at a pair wearing a skintight black bikini and skirt, pole dancing happily to the techno beat.

“... Those are even sexier than being naked.” Said Raine with her face heating up from mortification.

“ It’s still better than the two girls in the corner there, dancing on one pole together and kissing each other right?” Said M-014 unhelpfully from beside M-007.

The casting time for this skill would be 0.8 sec no matter the mastered skill level. This skill is a higher class of skill, for every level raised it would need 1.5 skill points to level up.

Raine is impressed with the new skills description, as expected of a higher rank skills although it needs to have a higher cost to compensate the benefit as well… She have no more skill points though… So gaining those skills would have to wait until she gains more skill points and the knowledge of what kind of enemies would she encounter in this futuristic world first. Raine then sent a mental projection to skip the skill selection this time as she have no available skill points left.

Familiar Token available in the primary inventory… Would you like to create your Guardian Force now?

Raine excitedly send a mental projection to confirm the creation of her Guardian Force.

Confirming… Checking primary inventory… No Slime cores are available to create the Guardian Force… Aborting process and returning the familiar token to the primary inventory…

Raine became disappointed after the announcement… She really need to find some slime cores soon as she really wanted to create her own Guardian Force. With disappointment, she sent a mental projection to move on to the next phase.

Uncharged human blood confirmed in the storage in the primary inventory. Would you like to charge the blood with mana and store it within the humanoid body?

Raine remembers that the charged blood is used as fuel for her humanoid body and as fuel for her spells so she sent a mental projection to confirm her acceptance to store it within her humanoid body.

Confirmation accepted… Charging the blood with mana would be an overnight process. Would you like to sleep while waiting as the process runs automatically? How much would you like to store the charged mana within the secondary body?

It seems that Raine needs to wait while the blood are being charged overnight and it will be pumped automatically into her humanoid body. Raine would prefer to sleep rather than wait for topping up her mana charged blood reserve, so she would follow the advice of the notice.

However for the amount of the stored charged mana capacity within her body… Raine thinks the more she have, the better it would be for her spell work. So Raine sent a mental projection for confirmation to sleep and to set the storing of charged blood with mana within her humanoid body to the maximum.

Confirmation accepted… connecting neural cores and setting up mana charged blood storage within the secondary body to the maximum. No outstanding notice at this point… Entering sleep mode…

Raine then feels her incorporeal form get sucked into her humanoid body and can feel her consciousness slipping as everything went dark around her. Raine is unsure how long she spent sleeping but she can hear someone calling out her name.

With a start Raine wakes up and can feel her sluggish body reacting to her name being called. Raine sees darkness surrounding her but can feel her body being heavy and becoming more sluggish after waking up. It takes a while before she recognizes the sound of her name being called as belonging to Mrs. Alakoni. She remembers that today Mrs. Alakoni would be introducing her to her new bodyguards which would be why Mrs. Alakoni is outside her tree calling out for her.

Hurriedly Raine sent a mental projection in order to exit the tree and to meet up with Mrs. Alakoni and her promised bodyguards.

Secondary body request for undocking… Notice… Storing of charged blood with mana within secondary body are complete… Capacity… Maximum… Movement speed may be affected when walking and moving on terrestrial land.... Undocking secondary body...Undocking…

Raine can feel her body moving from within the tree, heading for the exit. However she wonders if storing the mana charged blood to the maximum capacity means that her body now has become fat or chubby.

Raine then wonders if she should meet Mrs. Alakoni and her bodyguards at this point, but the point has become moot as she fully exits her tree and became fully materialized.

While standing at the base of her tree, Mrs. Alakoni and three new armored individuals standing behind her are already in front of Raine within a short distance away and all of them are looking at Raine’s sudden appearance like a ghost appears from within a tree shell.

While she cannot see the armored individuals’ facial expressions as all of them are covered by helmets, she can certainly see Mrs. Alakoni reactions… Mrs. Alakoni eyes are bulging and her face is getting redder by the second.

“Ms. Raine! What in the world has happened to you?” Shrieked Mrs. Alakoni.

“... So I get slightly taller and more athletic… And maybe chubbier…So?” Said Raine while she raised an eyebrow at Mrs. Alakoni extreme reaction.

“Ms. Raine... I have no problem with you getting taller and more athletic as that can only be a good thing in my book… But if you didn't realize, something else has certainly gotten larger during my absence…” Said Mrs. Alakoni with exasperation as she pointed downwards toward Raine’s body.

With a huff Raine looks down, expecting to see a bigger stomach. Only to be shocked when she sees how big her breasts has become! She now has breasts almost as big as her head! Thankfully the black undersuit given by Mrs. Ashi can stretch and adjusts to the change in her cup size and height, but it makes it worse as the undersuit are stretched to their maximum capacity, making her pair of breasts looks sexier as it clings to the fabric looking more tight fitting.

Raine then pokes at her new pair of breasts and remembers the fact that before she sleep, she did asks the mana charged blood to be stored to the maximum capacity within her humanoid body… So they did store it within her body, but she did not expect her breasts to be used as the storage tanks.

On the other hand, she feel nothing from poking her breasts. Raine concludes that there is no nerve endings surrounding her breast, hence she doesn’t feel any sensitivity at all as she rubbed her pair of breasts vigorously.

“Ms. Raine! Are you really rubbing your breasts in front of us!” Shrieked Mrs. Alakoni alarmingly.

“It’s ok, they’re just my fat reserve… It’s fine for them to see anyway as I am still clothed…” Said Raine with a flat tone as she tries to kill her shame and trying not to make it worse by panicking.

“Sigh… As you wish Ms. Raine… The reason for me calling you is to introduce you to your bodyguards behind me. I will introduce you to them now. We managed to get a Lai Dai affiliated, Adamantine-ranked Mercenary Squad to serve as your bodyguards under a discreet corporate contract. The Squad behind me are the famous Inferno Squad. Their leader is Iden Versio, a long time friend of the Lai Dai Corporation.” Said Mrs. Alakoni as she gestured behind her to the leading figure with black armour and helmet as well as a small drone hovering above said person.

As Raine watched, the tall and imposing figure steps forward from behind Mrs. Alakoni, approaches Raine and proceeds to take off the black helmet to expose a middle aged woman with black hairs tied from behind in a single bun. The middle-aged woman have dark brown skin and brown eyes. The soldier… As the woman cannot be anything but a soldier with the stern face and a strict countenance says.

“I waited 30 years for this… The chance to see the mythical Yggdrasil tree long whispered within the halls of Lai Dai corporation since I first heard of it when I was but a teenager holding my first handgun. It is an honour to meet you Ms. Raine and to see confirmation of such an amazing existence in the universe.” Said the woman, Iden Versio, as she offered her hand towards Raine for a handshake.

Raine returns the handshake with no hesitation and look at her in the eyes as is proper within the business community as avoiding eye contact means untrustworthiness.

“Likewise Ms. Iden Versio. I hope we can get along and work together as you serve as my bodyguard…” Said Raine as she became calmer and calmer as she successfully mentally grappled with her turmoil caused by her massive breasts.

“The pleasure is all mine, especially seeing such a cute assassin with cat ears and tail coming out of a mythical tree has in fact made my day Ms. Raine. And as you know, my name is Iden Versio and my role within this squad is to act as an Infiltrator Commando. I lead my squad and provide long distance fire support for them. Let me introduce you to my subordinates.” Said Ms. Iden Versio with a happy cheer as she turns and gestured for the two armored individuals behind Mrs. Alakoni to join her in greeting Raine.

As Raine watched, one of the armored individual approaches and took of the black helmet, exposing the face of a man in his thirties with a black hair and brown eyes.

“Greetings miss. It’s an honour to meet you, my name is Kaidan Alenko. I am a sentinel, if you have any tech problem whether it's repairing, scanning or hacking electronics you can look for me as I am your combat tech support for the squad.” Said Kaidan Alenko with a smile.

“Likewise Mr. Kaidan Alenko, I hope we can get along…” Said Raine modestly.

Before Kaidan can reply, Mrs. Alakoni interrupted both of them by joining them in their convesation.

“Ms. Raine is often quiet and doesn’t talk much so I hope you can forgive her. I have noticed most of the time she is doing her own thing and lost in her own world …” Said Mrs. Alakoni.

Raine ignored Mrs. Alakoni and just stands there acting like she cannot hear her. It has always worked with trolls and annoying people, so she sees no reason to change her tactic against them now.

“I can see your point director Alakoni, then let us move along after our last member has introduced himself…” Said Iden Versio as she gestured towards the final member of her squad, but to her confusion she can see the last member adopting a constipated pose halfway to the ground with both fists clenched tightly.

“What is wrong? Are you poisoned on the way here!?” Said Iden Versio as she commanded the last member with a no nonsense tone.

As Raine watched the last member of Inferno Squad ripped the black helmet open and Raine can see exposed underneath, a man, also in his thirties, with blonde hair, fair skin and freckled face, with brown eyes. Pumping his fists in excitement and hollering loudly.

“Hell yeah!!! Life is worth living! I never dreamed I would one day see an actual kuudere loli oppai kuro nekomimi in real life before! Oh if she was actually a meganekko as well that would be even more perfect!” Shouted the last member of the famous inferno squad.

“Ron Stoppable! Explain yourself in english! You are in the presence of an esteemed client!” Admonished Iden Versio towards the misbehaving member of her squad.

Raine happens to understand what Ron Stoppable is saying so she understand that he is one big pervert.

“Oh! Yes Chief! I was just referring to her as a cute catgirl before and was lamenting that she wasn’t wearing glasses!” Said Ron Stoppable as he salutes Iden Versio.

… And apparently a decent liar as well since he did not actually lie, he just deliberately decided not to divulge some of the things he actually said.

“Honestly! Go and introduce yourself first in front of the client so we can move onto more important things!” Said Iden Versio as she continues to admonish Ron Stoppable.

“Yes mam! Sorry for the spectacle there! My name is Ron Stoppable and I am a Combat Vanguard! Master of the martial art Tai Shing Pek Kwar or otherwise known as monkey kungfu! You need someone’s head bashed? Well don’t wait around and just look for me! And as an apology, allow me to sing a rap about how cute you are! I fancy myself a rapper you see and it would take only three minutes of your time! Rufus! Help me out with the beat and recording buddy!” Said Ron Stoppable excitedly as the drone hovering above Iden Versio chirped and start laying down a musical beat and starts recording Ron Stoppable dancing and singing in front of Raine.

“Are you going to allow this?!” Protested Mrs. Alakoni watching the spectacle in front of her.

“Unfortunately, I promised this jerk as his reward for being a Vanguard for the squad. Plus it’s his hobby, let it be, the recording shan’t be a problem as she will travel in public spaces in her current attire anyway.” Sighed Iden Versio as she gives the go ahead to the spectacles.

Raine then looks with bewilderment as Ron Stoppable sings and dance around her, praising the concept of cat girls. To Raine’s delight the beat was catchy and the lyrics amusing so she really enjoyed listening to Ron Stoppable’s performance. After 3 minutes as promised, Ron Stoppable’s singing and dancing performance wraps up and he stands in front of her waiting for a clap. To Ron’s delight, Raine did enjoy the performance and therefore gives Ron a hearty round of claps.

“Thank you! Thank you my lady! I hope you enjoyed the performance and forgive me for my earlier transgression!” Said Ron Stopable with a goofy and wide smile.

“I will! As long as you give me the recording of your performance!” Said Raine as she smiled with a lighter heart.

“Oho! That’s easy! Give me your right arm with the omnitool, and I will send over the link to the recording in the extranet, as I will also upload this to my blog and my followers can appreciate it as well! I am expecting another hit with this rap I can feel it!” Said Ron Stoppable as she requested Raine’s right arm where her omnitool is located.

Raine then offered her right arm and Ron starts to fiddle with the control panel.

“There! Done! I have saved the link in your control panel! So you can watch it any time if you need any pick me up!” Said Ron as he holds the omnitool holographic screen in front of Raine’s face.

Raine sees the link available inside her omnitool and can see the link saved in her control panel.

It reads: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2Im7K8e40hI it seems theirtube still prevailed even after the apocalypse, interesting.

Raine laughed happily at Ron’s antic and performance, she got the feeling that she would love traveling with this squad as she travel and explore this universe.

“Amazing, I have never seen Ms. Raine looks so happy before. I have to say your team is extraordinary. As expected of an Adamantine-ranked Mercenary Squad. I have high expectations for this venture that I hope you can deliver Iden Versio.” Said Alakoni as she gazes at the happy face of Raine and the silly antics of Ron Stoppable as Alakoni stand flanked by Iden Versio and Kaidan Alenko.

“Not to worry director Alakoni, we would take care of Ms. Raine. You have nothing to worry about with Inferno Squad backing up Ms. Raine’s travel. And with how amazing and pleasant the client is and with the reward you have given Inferno Squad, we would even consider doing this contract with the term above and beyond our stated duty as well. As we can see that this would be one magical ride for everyone involved and we have no intention to miss any of it.” Said Iden Versio with a grinning face and Kaidan smiling beside her as well, enjoying the spectacle in front of them.

“That might be so Iden Versio… That might be so…” Said Director Alakoni as she stares happily at Raine’s childish antics from playing with Rufus the drone and Ron Stoppable in front of her. It seems even an esteemed ancestor like her is childish at heart. Thought Alakoni as she secretly took pictures of her cute ancestor.

chapters.name: Chapter 8
chapters.content:
Raine is in a happy mood after playing with Ron Stoppable and Rufus, sometimes being young at heart is a lonely business. Unfortunately when you are an adult but maintain your hobby from your younger days you would be branded negatively in the eyes of society.

There was a time when she went online and the damned so called jocks would automatically imagine her as a fat unemployed slob still living in her parents basement when she mentioned her interests or commented on social issues. The jocks are discriminating her just by looking at her anime profile picture.

The judgemental stares of friends or relatives also became a bit much sometimes. Even though she was already a working adult, in their eyes certainly that fact mattered less than what you do in your damn spare times. God forbid they know she did write some fanfiction as a hobby, if it doesn’t make money then it’s trash.

She can’t help it though, the plot bunnies are hopping around her brain and they would not die unless you carbon-freeze them like what Boba Fett did to Han Solo onto a piece of blank white paper. How could she work in peace with the damn plot bunnies hopping around in her head. Damn you bunnies, die! Die, so she could work in peace.

With a start however she suddenly realizes that she have been getting off-topic in her musings. So Raine re-oriented her thoughts and concentrate on the present time and location.

Currently Raine is walking together with Mrs. Alakoni, Iden Versio, Kaidan Alenko, and Ron Stoppable to Mrs. Alakoni’s office in order to discuss their next move. Mrs. Alakoni has arranged for her to have bodyguards in her travel to learn more about the current age and what humanity has become in her absence. Raine and her group once again walk the same brightly lit and utilitarian hallway leading out of the chamber where her tree is located and secured.

Along the way, the personnel and the staff working and maintaining the facility cleared the way for their group and saluted respectfully as they pass. After passing through security checkpoints and the cafeteria, Raine is once again back in Mrs. Alakoni’s office.

Raine’s group then took the seats in front of Mrs. Alakoni’s office desk, with Mrs. Alakoni taking the director’s seat with the glass panel behind her, showing her staffs working and laboring hard in their respective tasks.

Once again Raine spotted the white persian cat jump unto Mrs. Alakoni’s lap, purred appreciatively and lay there demanding to be petted by Mrs. Alakoni.

“Oh Opalescence, you have become too spoiled recently.” Said Mrs. Alakoni as she starts to pet the white persian cat.

“Director, you have become the picture of decadence for having such a rare and expensive breed of cat in your possession.” Commented Iden Versio as she relaxes on her seat.

“Oh stop it Iden, Opal and her ilk have been in the family for generations. It’s not an issue at all for me feeding and taking care of her, it’s as much a status symbol for me as well as my stress relief in office so the expense is well worth it.” Said Mrs. Alakoni.

“It’s just a cat, surely there are a lot of them around.” Remarked Raine as she sat on the chair in front of Mrs. Alakoni.

“Any pets nowaday are a luxury Ms. Raine, as most pets such as dogs and cats are eaten rather than being a burden during the cold famine when the deep freeze happen. The pets that still existed today are descended from pets being kept by royalty, nobility, dictators, millionaires and billionaires from that time period. Opal here have the same value as small shuttle and if I maintain the purity of her lineage, her litters would have the same value. Of course some genetic engineering work needed to be done in order to keep in-breeding from happening. ” Explained Mrs. Alakoni.

“Alright, but I don’t want to keep talking about the cat. That is not why we are here after all.” Said Raine with a huff.

“Of course Ms. Raine, we should discuss our next move then. As you know, I have hired Inferno Squad to serve as your bodyguard during your travel. Of course you are free to go anywhere but I recommend you to go to our trade hub in Caldari Space. It’s a large station orbiting the 4th moon of Jita IV in the forge region of space. The station is originally meant to be an assembly plant for our Caldari Navy but has since become the largest tradehub in the whole universe. You would find all sorts of individual in all walks of life and practically all the organization in the universe who would be present in the station. I believe you would do well to make such a station your headquarter in between your travels.” Recommends Mrs. Alakoni as she petted Opalescence’s head on her lap.

“Not to mention, that place are packed with beautiful Gallente elves and the gear made by the Amarr dwarves are top notch as well! Why I remember Kaidan here was smitten with one of the elves during one of our shore leave.” Said Ron as he sits between Iden and Kaidan.

“What elves? And what’s this about dwarves?” Asked Raine with confusion marring her face.

Iden, Ron and Kaidan was startled from Raine’s question, with uncertainty they look at each other and then finally sends a questioning gaze towards director Alakoni.

“Oh did I forgot to mention that we have discovered we are not alone in the universe Ms. Raine…” Said Alakoni with chagrin.

“... You could have mentioned that after the apocalypse yes?” Said Raine flatly as she stares at the squirming Alakoni.

“I apologize Ms. Raine, so these aliens.. We have encountered and fought wars with them over the centuries, but currently we are at peace so it’s fine for you to meet them. Think of them as a chance to do some… Extreme cultural exchange. There are only three type of aliens that you would encounter, which is elves, dwarves, and orcs. This is a gross generalization but elves are snobbish, dwarves are stubborn and orcs are bastards. I think that should cover it all yes?” Said Alakoni sweetly.

Raine eyes are twitching but she sighed and decided to move on.

“Fine, I’d complain but I’m not exactly announcing my existence as well.” Said Raine with reluctance.

“Splendid, they just come out of the woodwork one day from the next galaxy to complain about our noise polluting television programs filling their airwaves, some arguments here and there, some fights, some drinking and we have been good friends ever since. Just like real life.” Said Alakoni.

“I can’t really tell whether you are joking or not…” Sighed Raine again with exasperation.

“Moving on from all these distractions Ms. Raine, as I have a new ship in orbit above us right now that I can’t wait to get into. Part of the agreement with director Alakoni is Lai Dai Corporation have agreed to trade in our old Cruiser, a standard Tech 1 Caracal, and replace it with one of Lai Dai’s exclusive product, a Tech 2 Heavy Assault Cruiser, the Cerberus. The transferring of our personnel and assets have already been completed and the ship is waiting for us in orbit. A shuttle is ready to take us off if you are ready to go.” Interjected Iden Versio impatiently.

“Of course Ms. Iden. I would love to flaunt about the Cerberus to Ms. Raine, but I suppose work does come before pleasure. However, before Ms. Raine can take offworld in the shuttle we should see Professor Dexter first for her to get her dropsuit and sidearms. Surely you don’t expect us to send out Ms. Raine just with the gear and weapon given personally by our private security contractor do you?” Admonished Alakoni as she activates her omnitool on her arm.

“Yes director?” Said the opposite channel as the image and voice of Professor Dexter come out from the device.

“Professor Dexter, I am currently in the company of Ms. Raine and Inferno Squad. Do you have the equipment ready for her to collect?” Asked Alakoni through her omnitool in front of Raine and Inferno Squad.

“Her equipment is ready to collect, we have prepared the dropsuit and a list of side weapons for her to choose from. As per your order we did not prepare any primary weapons as it is deemed that her physiology is not ready to use it yet.” Reported Professor dexter.

“Excellent, we would be on our way to your lab now Professor. Please prepare for our imminent arrival.” Said Alakoni with satisfaction.

“Understood director, we will be ready for your arrival.” Acknowledged Dexter.

Alakoni then deactivated her omnitool and shifted her attention to the group in front of her.

“Well then, as you have heard just now ladies and gentlemens. Let us proceed to Dexter’s lab for Ms. Raine dropsuit fitting and then she can take a pick from our side weapons selections before you can fly offworld to Inferno Squad’s brand new ship.” Said Alakoni as she put her beloved white persian cat Opal on the ground and stands up from her seat.

“About time Director Alakoni. I, for one can’t wait to get back to my room in the new Normandy ship. As I would like to try out my newly bought Playstation 45 gaming console. Even though the rotten tomato reviews says it’s an overpriced orange bastard with a lot of marketing hot air, but hey I bought it just to find out whether I should throw out my old black Playstation 44 Pro gaming console and replace it with the newer Playstation 45 console instead.” Said Ron excitedly as he stands and stretches his back.

“Although I was confused when I did some research online before buying the console though, as half are saying orange is the new black and the other half are saying the orange will kill off the company and they should have stick with the traditional black. I have never seen such a divisive reviews online. It’s like the whole internet is on fire with Playstation fanboys and fangirls starting up a civil war. The whole thing has become a messy riot which causes the world to laugh and insult gamers as a whole, but nobody laughed as loud as the fanboys and fangirls of the Xbox Cancer when they see the other side dispute and squabble among themselves.” Said Ron contemplatively as he puts a hand on his chin and taking a thoughtful pose.

“You really shouldn’t mention your hobby during work Ron, it’s simply not professional.” Complained Kaidan as he stands from his seat as well.

“You can berate me when you have slain more zombies than I do in multiplayer Kaidan.” Said Ron with some swagger and arrogant expression on his face.

Kaidan simply stay silent as he do not wish to continue this conversation in front of Iden Versio, their client and a VIP.

Simply taking Kaidan’s silence as an admission of defeat, Ron leads the way out of the office as he holds Alakoni’s office door like a butler.

Seeing that their business in Alakoni’s office are more or less wrapped up. Both Iden Versio and Raine stands from their seat as well and together with Alakoni and Kaidan exits the director office and proceed towards Dexter’s lab as Ron closed the door behind them.

On their way to Dexter’s lab, every staff and personnel they encountered cleared the way again for their group and salutes as they walk past. Although they still need to pass security checkpoints, it is just a matter of time before they reach the entrance to Dexter’s lab. Alakoni greets the pair of guards guarding the entrance and proceed to enter the lab, followed by Raine and her bodyguard entourage behind her.

Inside the lab, Raine could see Professor Dexter as well as his lab assistants lining up behind the Professor with some side weapons being presented on a metal tray as well as a few of some high tech looking drop suits for her. As Raine and her group walks closer to Professor Dexter, the Professor and his assistants stands straighter and more alert.

“Welcome back Ms. Raine, I hope you don't press any more button while you are back here in my lab this time… And I can see somehow you have done some make over a lot of growing up as well. I didn't realize looking like a cat is considered trendy nowadays by our youth.” Said Professor Dexter with some weariness, fear and confusion when looking at Raine’s new gear and cat girl / assassin appearance.

Raine nodded and made a motion of crossing her heart to show her sincerity not to press any button while in Dexter’s lab and choosing not to comment as Dexter and his assistants discreetly ogling at her pair of breasts.

“Well as long as you understand Ms. Raine.” Said Professor Dexter with some relief and reluctant acceptance, quite used to strangeness from his sister Dee Dee.

“Well Professor, let us start with the dropsuit first then. What do you have for Ms Raine?” Asked Alakoni from beside Raine.

“Very well then director, for the dropsuit I would limit the selection strictly to the light class of dropsuits as due to Ms. Raine physiology and stature, only this class of dropsuit would suit her best. We have three type for this class of dropsuit for Ms. Raine to choose from. The basic light frame type, it doesn’t come with any role specific customization but it comes with a better shield and shield recharge rate. Next we have the scout class light dropsuit, it have standard shield but it is designed and optimized for covert operations and stealth. And finally we have the pilot class light dropsuit, it have weaker shield, no stealth ability but compensates for that by having the best electronics capability in order to bypass and fly shuttles as well as some smaller class of spaceships. Now Ms. Raine, from among these suits. Which one interest you the most?” Asked Professor Dexter as he points at each dropsuits in front of Raine, being held by a lab assistant.

Raine thoughtfully considers and with certainty she choose the pilot class light drop suit. As she would value the ability to operate a shuttle and spaceship more than having a better shielding or stealth ability.

“The pilot class light drop suit, a good choice Ms. Raine. The dropsuit would serve you well I am sure of it. Caldari dropsuits are famed for having the best shields and electronics in the whole universe, the one we are outfitting you is one of our better models so please take care of it.” Said Professor Dexter with pride and caution.

With her choice, two of the lab assistants withdrew the light dropsuits type that she didn’t choose. The lab assistant holding the dropsuit she have chosen moves forward, and starts fitting the suit on to her undersuit given to her by Ms. Ashi. As the lab assistant is in the process of fitting the components and armours of the pilot class light dropsuit, a few new lab assistants move forward to present her the sidearms she could choose.

“Ms. Raine, this time please choose your sidearm. Please choose only one as it’s best to carry one type of weapon and it’s corresponding ammunitions in order not to burden your movement ability too much.” Explained Professor Dexter as Alakoni and Iden Versio looks on with interest.

“Now Ms. Raine, I would be explaining weapons in more detail compared to the dropsuits as a weapon is a dangerous thing and should be respected. Not that dropsuits is lesser compared to weapons you see but you must appreciate your armour and respect your weapon, that is our way, the caldari way.” Explained Professor dexter as one assistant move forward and presented a pistol in front of the standing Raine being fitted with the pilot class light dropsuit.

Raine looks with interest and even took a picture with her omnitool.
