“This here is the Flaylock pistol, a mainstay sidearms of the Gallente elves. This snub-nosed pistol have enough ammo for three shots per clip and you can carry a maximum of five clips in combat. The Flaylock is designed to fire one-inch direct attack missiles. Typically, the weapon is armed with pack-loaded dumbfire, or seeker missiles effective against infantry and armored targets, but is fully compatible with a broad range of missile types, making it one of the most versatile sidearm weapons on the battlefield. The seeker missiles utilize pre-launch lock-on and rudimentary self-guidance to track designated targets, though the finite propellant limits the practical engagement zone to short ranges. Although less effective against shielded targets, the tandem warhead allows penetration of armor layers before detonation, amplifying the effectiveness of the narrow fragment stream and maximizing each projectile's lethality. This weapon is the very image of the race it was born from, just like the elves it is an accurate but impotent weapon in combat. I am making a joke about their lack of ammo by the way as they can only shoot three times. ” Explained Professor Dexter as he waved the flaylock pistol away and gestured for the next lab assistant to move forward.

Raine looks with interest as yet another pistol was presented in front of her, she then took another picture with her omnitool.

“Next we have the Scrambler pistol, a mainstay sidearm of the Amarrian dwarves. This pistol have enough ammo for twelve shots per clip and you can carry a maximum of four clips in combat.The Scrambler is a semi-automatic pistol originally designed and manufactured by Carthum Conglomerate. A small-scale directed energy weapon, it produces a laser-induced plasma channel capable of dealing short-range pin-point damage to a target. Power consumption is excessive, but is addressed via a rear-loaded, self containing liquid fuel cell, allowing cells to be exchanged quickly and easily once exhausted. Moreover, advances in the polymers used in the weapon's construction have greatly reduced heat build-up and improved heat dissipation, resulting in improved reliability over earlier modules. This weapon is the very image of the race it was born from, just like the dwarves it is a powerful but stubborn weapon in combat. The weapon need some expertise to handle and if you don’t treat it well it will stop firing.” Explained the Professor yet again as he waved the scrambler pistol away and gestured for the next lab assistant to move forward.

Raine still look on with interest as yet another weapon is presented in front of her, curiously this time it’s not a pistol but it’s a small submachinegun. Raine once again took another picture with her omnitool.

“And finally we have this submachine gun, a mainstay sidearms of the Minmattar orcs. This submachine gun have enough ammo for eighty shots per clip and you can carry a maximum of 6 clips in combat. Favouring function over form, the SMG is a lightweight, full automatic weapon designed for close-quarters combat. What it lacks in stopping power and accuracy it grossly overcompensates for with quantity. Designed to injure and impede, the hailstorm of bullets the SMG produces is most effective in tight spaces against multiple targets.This original design is a paradigm of Minmatar construction. An inelegant but reliable weapon solution that is simple to produce, easily repaired using almost any available materials, and provides comparable pound-for-pound performance with similar sub-automatic weapons was a result of this design. Although an unabashedly low-tech weapon, it excels at what it was designed for: killing anything right in front of you. This weapon is the very image of the race it was born from, just like the orcs it is an effective but brutal weapon in combat. Since it is quite low tech by our standard, each bullet have low damage and stopping power, you would need ton of ammos in order to utilize this weapon effectively." Explained the Professor yet again as he waved the submachine gun away and gestured for the lab assistant to move backward and join the other two assistant holding the flaylock pistol and scrambler pistol.

Raine were waiting for the caldari sidearms to be presented to her as well but became confused when nothing happen and they act as if she needs to make the decision to choose from three sidearms weapon.

“What about the caldari sidearms?” Asked Raine with confusion.

To Raine’s bewilderment, everyone starts laughing at her words.

“Forgive me Ms. Raine, but you have already carried a fine Caldari sidearm with you all this time. Please pass me your Nova Knife, that knife is our mainstay Caldari sidearm. I can also do the explanation and expose of our mainstay sidearm as well if you’d like.” Said Dexter as he extended his hands, requesting for the Nova Knife currently sheathed on Raine’s thigh.

Raine, with a blushing face, unsheathed her ‘Blackprey’ ZN-28 Nova Knife and passed it to Professor Dexter outstretched hands. Raine also took a picture of her knife with her omnitool in order to complete the sidearms set.

“Ah yes, the ubiquitous Caldari Nova Knife, a mainstay sidearms of the Caldari humans. This knife of course has no ammo as it is a melee weapon, you could use it as a throwing knife but I wouldn’t recommend it as it is costly and it is not a disposable weapon. A close-quarters melee weapon, the nova knife is as deadly a weapon as anything on the battlefield. Its name derives from the heated plasma edge of the blade - formed by a thermic igniter and linear gravity condenser that, in skilled hands, can be used to carve through even the thickest Dropsuit armour. This weapon is the very image of the race it was born from, just like the humans it is a resilient but difficult weapon to master in combat. The only downside is that you have to be in striking distance in order to utilize this weapon, but this weapon is the pride of the human race and is featured in multiple coat of arms.” Explained the Professor as he hold Raine’s Nova Knife on his hands before he return the knife to Raine’s hand.

Raine then sheathed her ‘Blackprey’ ZN-28 Nova knife and direct her attention to the three lab assistant holding each sidearm weapon as if to gauge which weapon to take with her.

“Now Ms. Raine, we come back to which of three sidearm weapons that you will carry on with you in your journey. Remember that you can only choose one as it will not be possible to carry all three with you on your person. Will it be the grass-type Flaylock Pistol, the water-type Scrambler Pistol or the fire-type submachine gun?” Asked Professor Dexter as he gestured towards the three lab assistants holding the sidearm weapons.

“Grass-type, water-type, fire-type?” Said Raine with a confused tone as she tilted her head cutely.

“Never mind the terms Ms. Raine, it's something of an inside joke among our lab staffs.” Explained Professor Dexter humoredly.

“Then what is my Nova Knife type in that term? I am just curious.” Asked Raine as she holds the tip of her deactivated Nova Knife edged blade.

“Lightning-type obviously, now Ms. Raine, what would your choice of sidearm weapon be?” Asked Professor Dexter once again.

After some consideration, she decided to take the Amarrian dwarves Scrambler Pistol. Who wouldn’t want to use a futuristic laser pistol like Han Solo from Star Wars? Raine then points at the lab assistant holding the Amarrian Scrambler Pistol on his hands.

“... I choose the Scrambler Pistol.” Answered Raine as the lab assistant that is holding said sidearm weapon moved forward and presented the sidearm weapon to Professor Dexter.

The Professor then took the offered Scrambler Pistol and fiddled with the control panel momentarily.

“You have chosen the Scrambler Pistol as your main sidearm in your journey Ms. Raine. Are you sure of your choice?” Asked Professor Dexter once again.

“Yes, I am sure.” Confirmed Raine on her selection.

“Then this weapon will serve you well. I have registered this weapon under your name and by locking your genetic code to this Scrambler Pistol, it will only fire when it is in your possession. We already have a blood sample courtesy of Dr. Vahlen, even though I was told it didn’t come from your body, her scan result has shown that it is the same substance as the one circulating in your body. Please take this CAR-9 Burst Scrambler Pistol as your loyal companion, take care of it well and it will serve you faithfully.” Professed Professor Dexter as he passed back the native Amarrian Scrambler Pistol to Raine.

Raine accepted the offered Scrambler Pistol and holstered it on her right thigh.

“And before I forget, here are four full spare clips for your CAR-9 Burst Scrambler Pistol. Inside the clips are self-contained liquid fuel cell, if it ever break and spill please do not touch the spill it as it will be harmful to flesh and skin, and be warned it is extremely flammable.” Said Professor Dexter as he passed the spare full clips to Raine’s hand.

Raine accepted the offered clips and stored it in the pouches of her cat tail belt for easy retrieval and storage. Only then she realizes that the lab assistants that is fitting her pilot class dropsuit is no longer tinkering around her. Raine assumes that she already has everything she need from the Professor’s lab and ready to go onboard the shuttle offworld.

“Is this everything Professor?” Asked Raine to Professor Dexter.

“Not quite, there is one last piece of equipment you still need to complete your gear.” Said Professor Dexter as he snapped his finger and one of the lab assistant presented Raine with a black pilot helmet that complemented her suit nicely.

Raine took a glance at the offered pilot helmet and feel that the design is a bit imposing, and to her chagrin it still looks like a black cat. Raine does not believe everyone here will quit imposing their catgirl fetish on everything she is wearing anytime soon..

Nevertheless Raine still took the time to take a picture of the helmet with her omnitool.

“This pilot helmet suit the necessary electronics to interface with a shuttle and the smaller class of spaceships on-board computer and electronics. Just think about what you wish to do and the helmet system will do the rest for you.” Explained Professor Dexter as he offered the pilot helmet to Raine.

Raine accepted the offered helmet and found out that she can still wear her mask under the helmet as the space inside the helmet adjusted to fit the size of her head comfortably.

“Looking good Raine!” Said Ron excitedly.

“Yes, Ms. Raine it’s a good fit for you, and I am happy that you have chosen the scrambler pistol as well as it is the same model as I am using now. I can show you the ropes later if you would like.” Offered Iden happily.

“Sigh, I was sure that she would have chosen the Flaylock Pistol instead. The pistol have a homing capability that I was sure that would have sealed the deal.” Lamented director Alakoni taking the loss as a personal slight.

“Now director, isn’t it better if Ms. Raine have an expert to show her the ropes for a particular weapon?” Soothed Kaidan.

“I suppose you are right Mr. Kaidan, as long as Ms. Raine is happy with her choice I suppose.” Conceded Alakoni looking at Raine’s fitted form.

Raine can hear the conversation of both Alakoni and Kaidan very clearly even when she can see that they are conversing in a lower volume. It seems that the helmet is also enhancing her hearing and sight, as from within the helmet she can spot various HUD display of her surroundings. Names of personnel, their armour configuration and displayed weapon are also displayed in her HUD display.

Even the vehicle behind Professor Dexter is labelled as a Caldari Viper dropship, and was clearly marked that the helmet are able to interface and pilot such an impressive vehicle.

Raine was a bit woozy as her view suddenly zoomed into the Viper dropship and she can see the details of the ship in a clearer and sharper image.

“I am sure you are currently a bit overwhelmed with the HUD of the pilot helmet now Ms. Raine. If you can just spoke the word ‘scout mode’ it will revert it’s setting to a more natural feel for your eyes.” Said Professor Dexter helpfully in front of Raine.

“Scout mode.” Said Raine clearly.

Raine view are suddenly clearer now as all the HUD display disappears and replaced with her more normal unaugmented sight. The picture are still clearer and sharper than she is used to though and she is sure that this helmet also comes with night-vision as well.

“Yes this is better, thank you for the advice Professor.” Said Raine with gratitude as she bows slightly in thanks.

“Your welcome Ms. Raine, that is all we have for you today. However if you have any issue please do not hesitate to come to me or any of my staffs.” Replied professor Dexter acknowledging Raine’s thanks.

“Ms. Raine I can say that you are now ready for your trip offworld. Please follow me to the hangar, a shuttle has been prepared for your party and remember that the support of the Lai Dai’s group are behind you as you traverse the stars. However please try not to cause an incident with any of the aliens you encountered on Jita station as those kind of cases are legally more complicated than your average legal case.” Said Alakoni encouragingly as she give an advise for Raine’s journey.

“Yeah! It’s about time! Zombie slaying on Playstation 45 here I come!” Shouted Ron as Kaidan elbowed Ron none too gently which shut Ron up.

With that distraction over, Raine says her goodbye to Professor Dexter and his lab assistants. Then all of Raine’s group exits the lab and after walking for some time with Alakoni leading their group towards the hangar. Raine can see the transition of the hallway from bright and utilitarian towards a more metallic and practical design with pipes criss-crossing the rooftop. Raine then passed a large metal gate which leads to a large chamber even larger than the one with her tree in it.

Ahead of her, she can see a landing platform with aircraft personnels doing various tasks around the ship which she assumes is her shuttle offworld.

“Scout mode off.” Said Raine as her HUD activated again and confirmed her assumption that the ship is her shuttle offworld. Raine’s view are then zoomed closer to the shuttle and make the shuttle have a brighter and clearer image in the dimmed surroundings of the landing pad.

“That’s our ticket off Earth Ms. Raine, the journey should take around 10 minutes for us to reach my ship in orbit. I hope you are mentally prepared for a serious culture shock when we reach the Jita Station. I will show you around as it is my Squad’s base of operation when trying to find any mercenary work.” Said Iden Versio from Raine's side.

Raine just nodded and standing around as Alakoni are clearing the red tapes for the shuttle launch offworld with her director clearance. Alakoni then shortly cleared Raine and her group for launch after discussing it shortly with the landing pad flight control.

Iden Versio, Kaidan Alenko and Ron Stoppable have already proceed ahead without Raine but somehow Raine trailed behind and walks closer to Alakoni as she felt that she have something to say before they say their goodbyes.

“Ms. Raine, I hope you have a safe trip and return back to us when anytime you want. Know that you will always have a home with us here.” Said Alakoni full of emotion like a parent letting her child off at her first day of school.

Raine rolled her eyes behind her helmet, but decided to hug Alakoni in this instance. As she felt she needs to be the great grandparents instead of being treated like the granddaughter with her hands being held.

“Know that I am proud of what our family have achieved here and today. Not only you but to all of our family, I hope you can let everyone know as well. And I will be back one day bringing great gifts for the family! Just wait and see.” Said Raine returning Alakoni’s heartfelt emotion.

Alakoni sniffed and avert her eyes as they separated, Raine then walked away through the landing pad and into the shuttle’s ramp where the rest of the group are waiting for her. Raine then turns around on the shuttle ramp and waved goodbye at Alakoni’s waiting figure.

“Goodbye Mrs. Alakoni! I hope you take care of yourself and the company in my absence!” Shouted Raine as she say her goodbye.

“I will Ms Raine, don’t worry! Goodbye and have a safe journey!” Shouted Alakoni in reply.

Raine’s last view of Alakoni is her standing on the edge of the landing pad and furiously waving her hand in goodbye at Raine.

“You will see her again Ms. Raine, Separation makes the heart fonder after all. Just make sure you stay in one piece and return home. That’s all that matters and no matter who say otherwise, a mercenary’s priority is not money, it is returning back to a home worth returning to.” Advised Ron Stoppable beside Raine in the confine of the shuttle’s ramp.

“Wise words, Ronald. It’s unbecoming of you, I am surprised.” Said Raine quietly.

“I have my moments.” Said Ron as he looked away in embarrassment.

Raine and her group then moved on from the shuttle ramp and into the shuttle’s passenger seats. As everyone’s buckling on their seat Raine hears the pilot’s announcement.

“Ready for dust off, we are taking off for docking with Normandy SR-2 in orbit.” Announced a woman’s voice which is the shuttle’s pilot.

Raine then felt the shudder of the shuttle’s taking off and when she take a view of the outside of the shuttle from the window, she can see the chamber where she was in with Alakoni earlier.

Raine can feel the shuttle takes off vertically and keep on ascending until she can see the rooftop opening up if she looks up from the shuttle’s window.

And with a sudden acceleration she can feel the shuttle exits the opening and she can see the view changed into snow white as they fly into the middle of a raging blizzard and hail.

The ice from the hail are pelting the shuttle yet the ice and the wind pressures are not impeding the shuttle at all as Raine can feel the G-force as the shuttle keep accelerating faster and faster almost vertically.

From the shuttle’s window, Raine can see the view as the ground becoming smaller and the world becoming rounder until she can see the sun peeking out on the horizon and the stars appears among the darkness of space beyond that as her destination.

Raine is not able to see anything beyond the darkness of space but if she look down to Earth, for a moment her thought processes halted as she sees for one beautiful moment the white swirling cloud and the blue roiling oceans superimposed with the sun’s reflection on planet earth surrounded by stars in the darkness of space and she can feel a tear drop from the corner of her eyes from the beauty of the view. Even though the homeworld is ravaged, it’s still living, it’s still beautiful and that makes it worth fighting for.

There is a horde of critters coming, put back missile launcher, take out a flamethrower. There is a meddling hero ruining your fun, put back flamethrower, take out a big mallet.

chapters.name: Chapter 9
chapters.content:
Raine’s attention is transfixed from the window of the shuttle on the view of the world below. Her attention is broken however when Iden Versio started to speak from the seat beside her, asking for her attention.

“Ms. Raine, I’m sorry to interrupt your musing but we’ll be reaching the ship soon. And I will be asking the shuttle pilot to orbit around the ship so you can see how it looks from outside.” Said Iden Versio.

Raine shifted her attention to Iden Versio and nodded at her words. Raine then sees Iden wearing her helmet and pressing her right hand to the right side of her head.

“Pilot, this is Iden Versio. Captain of the Normandy SR-2 inside the shuttle. Please arrange for an orbiting maneuver around the Normandy SR-2 at an orbital distance of five hundred meters, set the shuttle speed nice and slow there.” Said Iden Versio transmitting a radio signal from her helmet to the shuttle pilot’s cockpit.

After a pause, Raine can feel the shuttle take a sudden turn and then after a while slightly turn to the opposite direction. Eventually, Raine can see the view of Iden’s spaceship from her side of the window.

The ship looks imposing and large, Raine can see the missile pods jutting out near the engines and the command section of the plane. So this is the ship exclusively made by Lai Dai Company, the Cerberus, the ship that Mrs. Alakoni is so proud of. Raine took a picture of the ship with her Omnitool.

“Ain't she a beauty Ms. Raine? I’ll miss the old Normandy but the Cerberus is too good a ship to miss using compared to the standard Tech 1 Caracal ship which is the original Normandy.” Said Iden Versio with a bittersweet tone.

Raine didn’t answer Iden immediately, instead, her attention is drawn to the older looking ship beside the Cerberus cruiser that the shuttle is orbiting around.

“I agree Ms. Iden, the Cerberus is a beautiful ship. Why is there another ship beside it though? I noticed that both ships look similar but the other one looks older and have fewer missiles and equipment attached to it compared to the Cerberus.” Asked Raine as she tilts her head curiously.

“Ah, that’s my old ship, the original Normandy, she looks lesser because that’s how it is if you are comparing a Tech 1 Standard Caracal Cruiser with a specialized Tech 2 Cerberus Heavy Assault Cruiser. And regarding your question why they look similar, it’s because the hull of the Tech 2 Cerberus is based on the hull of the Tech 1 Caracal, it is just designed and fitted with better technology. For your understanding, a Tech 2 ship is generally better in everything compared to a Tech 1 ship. Tech means technological level, you can consider that the higher the Tech level then the better the performance of a ship or an equipment it would be. Tech 1 is generally used by everyone and is pretty mundane. The Navy used a different version to Tech 1 which have a better performance as well, which you may call as Military Grade Tech 1, but the Navy version still cannot beat a Tech 2 version. Not everyone can get a Tech 2 item unless you have a very high connection with one of the Mega Corporations and each corporation controls a different exclusive Tech 2 designs so it’s a pretty big deal to get one. I have also heard rumors of Tech 3 being researched floating around but the details are top secret as I cannot get anything from my contacts.” Explained Iden as she points out from the shuttle’s window from beside Raine.

Raine nodded and paused while filing the information inside her mind, but she removed Iden’s old ship from her mind and shifted her focus towards the Cerberus ship still centered in front of her view. Curiously, her HUD display is still active from when Raine turns it on to analyze the shuttle she was boarding back in the landing pad 15 minutes ago. Raine willed the HUD to analyze the Cerberus ship in front of her and then an image of the Cerberus ship took over her whole view in front of her.

Cerberus - Caldari Tech 2 Heavy Assault Cruiser

No cruiser currently in existence can match the superiority of the Cerberus's onboard missile system. With a well-trained pilot jacked in, this fanged horror is capable of unleashing a hail of missiles to send even the most seasoned armor tankers running for cover.

Developer: Lai Dai

Moving away from their traditionally balanced all-round designs, Lai Dai has created a very specialized - and dangerous - missile boat in the Cerberus. Many have speculated that due to recent friction between Caldari mega corporations, rumors abound that Lai Dai may be looking to beef up their own police force with these missile-spewing monstrosities.

Raine blinked away the rush of information from her HUD helmet and willed the Tech 2 Cerberus information panel away from her sight. The information then minimized itself out of her sight and stays at the corner of her vision.

However, Raine noticed what the Cerberus ship looks like in the information panel HUD and what the same ship looks like in front of her are slightly different...  Perhaps a different variant?

“Ms. Iden, your ship version of Cerberus looks different compared to what is in my helmet’s database. Did you request that your ship would have a different feature?” Asked Raine as she turns her head and facing Iden’s direction.

“In fact I did, I requested for the “Zero” Variant. The same taste, “Zero” armor. If the shield is gone, we would be screwed anyway so I requested the armor to be removed. On the upside this armor removal makes the “Zero” Variant possess way better agility and speed compared to your “Average” Cerberus. As a mercenary, I’d rather have the ability to quickly run away or chase down prey anyway. Let the Navy stand down their ground and fight, that’s not our job as mercenary.” Said Iden as she shrugged at the different mindset of the Navy and the mercenary.

“I’d believe it's because the boys in the Navy wants to live just like any normal person would, that’s why they kept the armor on Ms. Iden... Besides, doesn’t matter how fast you go, I can imagine a missile would have chased your ship down and hit it anyway.” Said Raine as cold sweats start to appear and she starts to have a second thought about boarding Ms. Iden’s suicidal ship.

“Ah..Ah..Ah.. You and everyone else may think that way Ms. Raine, but we’re not stupid. We have countermeasures for that. In fact, I’ll show you myself when we are already aboard the ship.” Said Iden Versio as she wiggles one of her index finger in front of Raine’s faceplate condescendingly.

Raine didn’t say anything in response to Iden's words but behind her faceplate, her expression became skeptical of Iden’s claim.

“If you say so Ms. Iden.” Replied Raine reluctantly.

Iden acknowledges Raine’s reply and returns to her seat and Raine can hear her contacting the pilot again.

“Shuttle Pilot, this is Iden Versio, we’re done here. Stop the orbiting maneuver and proceed to dock with the Normandy SR-2” Said Iden as she raised her right hand again and rest it on the right side of her helmet.

Afterward, Raine can feel the shuttle shifted towards the Normandy SR-2 and from her window, she sees the ship gradually disappearing from her view as the shuttle makes a slow and subtle maneuver to dock beside the Normandy SR-2. As the shuttle slows to a stop, Raine can hear multiple metallic sounds softly impacting the hull of the shuttle. After a few minutes, Raine can feel the shuttle shakes slightly.

“Greetings valued passengers, this is your captain speaking. I’m afraid we are stopping briefly as for State purpose we are now docked with a combat cruiser next to us for military personnel to transfer over in short order. We apologized for the inconvenience and we will soon resume our flight to Hek Station, Metropolis System, Minmatar Space. Your safety is important to us, hence we will be making another stop at a military outpost as a pair of Caldari Navy frigates will be escorting us to our destination. Thank you for flying with United Spacelines.” Announced the captain of the shuttle.

Raine stands from her seat as Iden, Kaidan, and Ron did as well. Iden leads the way out of the shuttle, followed by Kaidan, Ron, and Raine. Raine walks through the hallways of the shuttle, and then took a flight of staircase up, from there she can see rows and rows of civilian passengers ahead of her.

Since Raine is the last person of the group she can see some passengers shocked expressions as they see her small and short form fitted with military combat gear and weapon following behind the taller and more imposing form of Iden, Kaidan, and Ron. Raine can feel the weight of the stares of the passenger from behind her and can hear some passengers took pictures with their omnitool.

Thankfully their group is walking too fast so the passengers only get a glimpse of what her back looks like as they passed by the shuttle aisles, she can imagine where their attention would be drawn to if they could see her from the front. Raine proceeds to walk quicker and crossed her arms in front of her to hide her enlarged breast from view.

To Raine’s relief, after a while, she can see the front of the shuttle where a door can be seen as well as the flight attendants. The flight attendants politely greeted and say their goodbyes as their group went through and exits the door of the shuttle.

Raine then founds herself inside a lit and empty bridge, the type she used to use in the airports in her time in the distant past. Raine has to stop though as everyone in front of her is also standing still. Raine was wondering what is the holdup but before she can ask, the opening behind her sealed and closes itself, blocking her view of the flight attendants and the shuttle. Through the sealed bridge door she can hear the shuttle door also closing, she can hear some clicks sound as the shuttle disengaged itself from the bridge and then silence as she assumed the shuttle have moved away from the bridge and continued it’s journey to Hek. True to the laws of nature, she can’t hear anything as the shuttle moved away, the adage "In outer space no one can hear you scream." still applies it seemed.

What Raine can still hear though is the sound of machinery surrounding the bridge as the length of the bridge contracted itself to return to the Normandy SR-2. When the bridge stopped moving, she can hear the sound of a door unsealing itself ahead of her, but unfortunately she’s not able to see anything past the back of the person in front of her due to her short stature. Before she knows it, the person in front of her moved again and she can see the interior of the Normandy SR-2 as Iden, Kaidan and Ron went in and step aside waiting for her.

“What are you waiting for Ms. Raine? Permission to come aboard? Well, it’s granted by myself as the commander of this vessel then.” Said Iden with mirth as she waved Raine to come in the Normandy SR-2

Hearing the encouragement, Raine slowly exits the bridge and stepping into the Normandy SR-2 dark and dimly lit halls.

“That’s a good girl Raine, now if everyone doesn't mind excusing me. I have a date with the 45th reincarnation of Sony game console.” Said Ron as he salutes and walked away to look for his quarters.

“If you don’t mind Commander Iden. I would be looking for something to eat in the mess hall as well.” Said Kaidan as well as he salutes and waits for Iden Versio's approval before he walked away looking for the mess hall.

“Well, Ms. Raine looks like it’s just the two of us girls left behind by our man to fend for ourselves.” Said Iden jokingly as she looks down at Raine’s faceplate in the gloom of the Normandy’s halls.

“Oh, I wouldn’t say that commander.” Said a suave and gentlemanly voice as a bald elderly man shows himself from behind one of the dark space behind the Normandy’s pillar.

Raine was so startled that she reflexively draws her CAR-9 Burst Scrambler Pistol and pointed it at the elderly man who suddenly appears near her. Looking beside her, she also saw that Iden Versio has also done the same and has drawn the same CAR-9 Burst Scrambler Pistol while pointing it at the head of the elderly man in front of the both of them.

“Yaaahh!” Screamed the unnamed elderly man in fear.

For a moment Raine thought that for an elderly man, he sure has a shrill and girly scream like a certain, yellow-skinned, bald, fat cartoonish American man from a TV series of her time.

“Oh Charles, you shouldn’t scare me like that. I almost shot your head off.” Said Iden as she exhales, trying to relax her wound up nerves and holstered back her Scrambler Pistol.

“Duly noted commander, now if you would please help me ask the young lady beside you to lower her pistol from pointing at me that would be much appreciated.” Said Charles comically as he still raised both his arms in a gesture of surrender.

“Oh Ms. Raine you can lower your weapon now, he’s not an enemy. His name is Charles Pressly, the navigation officer of the Normandy SR-2.” Explains Iden as she attempts to calm down Raine.

Raine sighed and holstered her weapon as well, not happy that she was startled so badly.

“Yes, Ms. Iden…” Murmured Raine.

“Now that the misunderstanding is over with... Commander Iden, may I ask where would our destination be? The ship is prepped and ready for departure.” Said Charles Pressly, the navigation officer, with relief as he lowers both of his arms and assumes a standby position.

“Hmm? Oh right, set course for Jita IV, Mr. Pressly. We would be heading for the Jita trade hub station in that system. Contact our office at that station and inform them that we will be heading back to HQ for familiarization with our new toys from Lai Dai Corporation. By the way, have Lai Dai's representatives delivered the new Tech 2 Hornet light drones and the Caldari Navy Hornet light drones on board yet?” Asked Iden as she motions for both Charles and Raine to follow in her wake through the Normandy’s hallway.

“Understood Commander, I will set a course for Jita IV immediately and would update our resident pilot that our course has been decided and have him ready on the ship’s bridge helm. And regarding the shipment of drones, we have received it from the Lai Dai representatives this morning and they have already left for the ground side not too long ago. We are waiting for your instructions on what to do with them next.” Answered Charles Pressly as he walks briskly behind Iden Versio and Raine.

Support the creativity of authors by visiting the original site for this novel and more.

“That is good, we are ready to depart then. You can go and arrange for our course and go tell Joker as well that I expect him to be on standby in the pilot seat on the bridge later. Regarding the drones in our cargo hold, I will be heading there now to instruct our mechanics to start overhauling and reprogramming the drones to our usual arrangement. I will be showing them off to our esteemed guest behind us and we will be heading to the ship’s bridge for departure.” Commanded Iden as she instructed the navigation officer on the ship's next moves.

“Very well commander, by your commands.” Acknowledged Charles Pressly as he crisply saluted at Iden Versio and splits off towards another path when their party encountered an intersection in the ship’s internal hallway, presumably to carry out the new instruction he just received.

Raine has been silently following and eavesdropping the conversation between Ms. Iden and this Charles Pressly. She does have some question on some of the term she has heard but chose to bring it up later when they have reached the hangar docks to see these “drones” she has been hearing about.

Along the way to ship’s hangar dock, Raine and Iden have been steadily encountering more and more personnel stationed within the Normandy. Everyone they passed immediately clears the way and salutes at Ms. Iden as both of them passed through, salutes which are returned by Ms. Iden.

Maybe Raine should be doing the same, and salutes them back like Ms. Raine. But on second thought even though she is on the ship, as she is not part of the crew, Raine is under the impression that she is exempt from such custom.

However, it was still funny, seeing the adverse reactions of the crews when they saw her. The men gaped and the women get depressed somehow and she’s clueless on why the women’s reaction are very much different compared to the men that she has passed.

After walking farther than she first assumed in order to reach the hangar cargo, Raine can finally see the sealed entrance to the hangar of Normandy SR-2. Raine knows that the large metallic door entrance is the entrance of the hangar since it was clearly labeled so above it. Hence with Iden leading the way, the sealed door opens automatically as both of them gets nearer to it.

After both Iden and Raine enters the cavernous hangar, Raine pauses to marvel at the rows and rows of drones roughly the size of a fighter jet inside the cavernous hangar dock of the Normandy SR-2 being manned and checked by the mechanics and technicians spread out around the hangar.

Raine approaches one of the drone nearest to her, leaving behind Ms. Iden who it seems is currently asking one of the mechanics for someone. While Ms. Iden is distracted, Raine proceeds to analyze the drone in front of her.

Caldari Light Scout Drone - Hornet II

An improved version of the standard Tech 1 Hornet, compared to the Tech 1 versions the Hornet II generally have better performance across the board and significantly faster than the Tech 1 versions with better weapon output. Although more resilient material and more robust hardware and computing power also mean an increase in manufacturing cost, so utilizing these drones should be done after doing a research whether the increase in performance is really needed in carrying out the operation. As like Caldari techs in general, Hornet II dishes out kinetic damages using their equipped pair of onboard 75mm Gatling Railguns. Hornet II have a more advanced circuitry so more complex calculations can be done with Hornet II compared to the Tech 1 version. The AI of the Caldari light drones can be considered as the most lethal and the most efficient of the drone technologies available anywhere, and the AI of the Hornet II is on top of the already impressive Caldari drone list.

Raine reads the information panel of the Hornet II in front of her as provided by her helmet’s HUD. From the information provided, she can consider these drones to be the equivalent of an automated assault helicopter from her time. Although these drones are obviously meant for use in the void of space.

“Hey, everybody! Our glorious leader has returned!” Said a loud voice echoing within the hangar chamber attracting the attention of everyone, including Raine.

Raine lifted her head from the drone in front of her and looks back behind towards the direction she came from. There Raine can see someone walking towards Ms. Iden, a stocky and short looking gentleman with a long handlebar mustache, wearing mechanics outfit and most amazing of all is his left arm which is mechanical from the elbow down.

Raine raised her right arm and proceed to take a picture using her omnitool as the person in question stopped and looking at her direction.

“Woah! What’s a kid doing inside my hangar eh? I will not be having her messing around with my equipment. Can someone take her out? I don’t want the kid to get hurt stubbing her toe on something here!” Said the dirty looking man as he gestured wildly towards Raine and looking at one of the more junior looking mechanics near him to get it done.

Thankfully before anyone can kick Raine out, Ms. Iden intervenes and stop them from carrying out the dirty old man’s order.

“Belay that order! Honestly, that’s our VIP client this time. It’s because of her we got a contract with one of the mega-corporation and have access to their techs in the first place.” Admonished Iden as she raised a hand to stop the younger mechanics from approaching Raine.

“Are you sure commander? She got the bling for sure but does she got the skills to use them properly? I don’t want her to hurt herself carrying those knife and gun you know.” Said the dirty old man as he approaches Raine.

Raine silently observes the short and stocky man approaching her. In her mind, she is disgruntled because the men in the hangar are looking down on her because their boss has already crossed her out as a snotty-nosed brat. Now she is brainstorming inside her mind on how she can rectify that…

Perhaps… Raine can practice her magic on the approaching man. He certainly looks strong and robust enough to take a hit. Among the spells she has at her disposal, the Lvl 10 Napalm Beat would be the most appropriate to use here as the man gets closer and closer.

Raine waits until the man is practically standing directly in front of her and when he raised his arm with the real hand attached reaching out for her, that was the moment Raine strike with her right fist.

Before the blow was struck, Raine can spot the man smirk at her attempt. She cast the spell silently the moment her fist strikes his stomach, as that’s the highest place she can reach while still delivering the power of the blow. From her fist, multiple invisible orbs lashed out and strike against the larger man stomach and with a shout, he was pushed back two meters from Raine.

While Raine is disappointed that the man did not fall down from her strike, it was still satisfying nevertheless that she managed to wipe the smirk from his face with that strike. Not only that, looking around she saw that the men and women around her are looking at her with their jaw dropped from disbelief.

“Damn girl! What did your parents feed you? I gotta know, I don’t know how you can punch me that hard. I was practically thrown back from that blow! You a dwarf behind that faceplate girlie?” Exclaimed the dirty old man as he pointed at Raine, still in her striking pose.

Raine lowers her hand to in front of her face and stands serenely while clenching and unclenching it slowly.

“I have no parents... And I can ask the same of you, I was disappointed that you didn’t fall over from that strike.” Said Raine coolly and without care.

The dirty old man sobered up at that and patted at his overall to clear up some of the grime and dust coatings.

“I feel that we get off on the wrong foot there girl, I apologize for that. My name is Rory Swann, I am the Chief Engineer of this outfit and the commander come to me when she needs some work done on our techs and equipment. And for sure I won’t fall down from that! I’m a half dwarf you see! Me mom’s a dwarf and me dad’s a human. Mom’s still alive and managing a bakery ground side but me dad’s passed away from old age. Ah, bless his old bones, it’s too bad that human life span is lesser compared to dwarfs. I was still considered a young man by dwarf standard when he passed away at the age of 90.” Said Rory Swann as he walks closer to Raine again and offered her hand at Raine as a peace offering.

Raine looks at the hand offered and with good intent also clasped his hand with both hands as his one hand is enormous compared to her own hands.

“Likewise Mr. Swann, my name is Raine Sioux and as your commander has said I am here as the client for Inferno Squad. And to answer your question, no I am not a dwarf but I won’t answer what I am as a woman have her secrets right?” Raine replied cheekily as she shakes her hands with Rory Swann and let his hand go afterward.

“Haha! Well with that kind of tits then you’re not an elf for sure! Surely you’re human!” Said Rory Swann crudely as he laughed boisterously.

“Hmm, who says they’re real? I could be an elf who’s sick of being flat chested and decided to put in a pair of water-filled balloons as the replacement. What about yourself? As a half dwarf that means since your mother is a dwarf, she would also look young and short as well right? Perhaps your father is a pedophile that’s why he goes for dwarves?” Said Raine teasing Rory Swann back.

“Whhhhh….Whaaaat!? I’ll have you know me mom was an adult by dwarf standard! She already has a proper beard and everything! She looks beautiful, full bodied, strong and makes a mean draft beer at home!” Sputtered Swann in embarrassed denial.

“Well Mr. Swann, it’s not good to feel that way about your own mother you know? Do you have a mother complex?” Said Raine in glee.

Raine have fun seeing Mr. Swann face becoming redder by the seconds and he lay down on his back against the ground and wiggle his arms and legs furiously in frustration. Raine giggled softly in glee at Swann’s frustration and so does everyone else looking at their boss defeated so badly by a little girl in his own workshop.

“Grahhh! Commander! This girl is impossible! Stop laughing and come here! Speak your mind and begone the both of you! I’ll be having me peace back and the sooner the better!” Shouted  Swann in frustration as he stands abruptly and turns towards the laughing Iden Versio behind him and Raine.

“Hahahaha! Oh, Swann, this is the first time I have ever seen you so whipped. What’s the matter? You’re used to dishing it out that you can’t stand to be on the receiving end?” Laughed Iden happily.

“As if! If anything she’s cheating because she’s a little girl! I can’t hit a little girl! What will that say about me being a man hitting a little girl! ARRRGGGGGGHHH!” Screamed Swann suddenly.

“That tells me that you’re a dead man walking when you turn your back to an opponent... Just because I’m a little girl should you really be keeping your eyes off me?” Said Raine coldly as lightning arcs around her open hand and omnitool on her arm.

Swann is still standing but in pain as electricity numbed his limbs and body, but he still managed to turn his body around and face Raine again. Swann’s hair is frizzled from the electricity and his bionic arm is short circuiting and twitched now and then refusing to follow Swann’s command.

Napalm Beat!

Another wave of invisible force flies from Raine’s outstretched hand and strikes Swann’s torso, which toppled Swann to the ground again. The spell works better this time as Swann in his stunned state from the electricity coursing in his vein does not have the strength to resist the spell's effect. To everyone else though, they just saw a little girl force push their chief engineer to the ground.

Raine leisurely walked to the downed Swann and stepped on his chest just as he tried to rise up.

“Who’s the little girl now?” Said Raine as she looks down on Swann.

“Arghh me legs. I am, now could you please help me up young miss?” Groaned Swann as he gives up on preserving his dignity as he cannot go against his little girl client.

Raine removes her boot from Swann's chest and offered a hand to Swann’s face. He’s a bit heavier than she expected but managed to help Swann to stand up in the end. Raine feels that she really needs to raise her strength stat for this kind of situation.

“Ms. Iden..” Said Raine as she turns towards Iden Versio behind her. Humorously the mechanics near Iden took a step away from Iden just as Raine said her name.

“Kitty got claws, I like it.” Said Iden Versio as she whistled appreciatively, Rufus the drone hovering above Iden recorded the whole thing.

“Do what you need to do here and let us move on. I am impatient to kill something to get stronger already..” Said Raine flatly as she walks nearer to Iden followed from behind by the limping Swann.

“Hmm... As you wish Ms. Raine, hey Swann I leave it to you to reconstruct and reprogram the three Hornet II we have to ignore other drones and ships, have them to focus only on incoming missiles and rockets heading to the Normandy SR-2. As usual, take out their pair of 75mm Gatling railguns and replace them with a pair of Gatling pulse lasers from our warehouse.” Instructed Iden Versio to the slowly approaching Swann.

“Hmph, as you wish commander. What about the three Caldari Navy Hornet we have over there?” Acknowledged the grimacing Swann as he pointed to the different pattern drones farther from their current position.

Raine followed the direction Swann is pointing to and her helmet HUD analyzed the different Hornet Variant.

Caldari Light Scout Drone - Caldari Navy Hornet

An improved version of the standard Tech 1 Hornets, compared to the Tech 1 versions these Caldari Navy Hornets exclusively available to the Caldari Navy have the best shield and armor around compared to other variants of Hornets. This makes the Caldari Navy Hornet slower but some feel that the tradeoff is worth it since the improved shielding and armor significantly improved the Navy variant Hornet’s staying power. As like Caldari techs in general, Hornets II dishes out kinetic damages using their equipped onboard twin railguns. The higher strength material significantly increased the cost of the Navy variant construction, as it is the cost to manufacture one of this drone is even higher than the Hornet II variant. In terms of electronics though the Hornet II have the edge in processing power.

“Have the pair of 75mm Gatling Railgun removed from the three Hornet II to be installed in each of the three Navy variants. Remove the AI chassis from all the Navy variant and replace it with a pilot configuration frame and an upgrade to the power grid to accommodate for the extra pair of 75mm Gatling Railgun. Assign me, Kaidan and Ron as the pilot for each Navy variant. And while I am at it, install an ‘arbalest’ rocket launcher for each Navy variant, take it from our warehouse. I know we have some there from our last raid.” Instructed Iden Versio to the nodding Rory Swann.

“We can do that, it will take a while though and after that, you can’t really call them drones anymore since you’re practically converting them into a one-man space fighter. What would we even call them when we deploy them in combat?” Asked Swann as he brainstorms on how best to deliver what the commander requested.

“I don’t know. Just call them TIE fighter for all I care, they do have Twin Ion Engine strapped to their back in all variants of the Hornets anyway.” Said Iden Versio with a huff at the stupid question.

“Is that what it stands for? To be honest, when I first heard the term when I was studying at the academy I thought the engine was made by Thai people. Swann still maintains the salute even after Iden and Raine left for the command bridge. He waited until the coast is really clear before he relaxes and dropped his arm.

With a stern and red face, Swann turns around to look at all his mechanics and technicians in the hangar and glared at all of them in a smoldering death stare.

“Anybody ever mentions what happen today to anyone else or if it ever gets out to the other crew about what happen today will know how it feels to have their pubes pulled out by me claw. Kapishe?!” Shouted Swann as he threateningly open and closes the metal pincer of his left arm with an ominous click-click-click sound.

Everyone pales and can only nod their heads rapidly without uttering a sound,  except the women who giggled in mirth.

“And the women will also receive the same treatment. Damn busy bodies.” Grumbled Swann as he shift eyes to the paling female mechanics and technicians under his employ.

chapters.name: INTERMISSION - CHARACTER SHEET : TANYA DEGURECHAFF
chapters.content:
INTRODUCTION

Tanya von Degurechaff is the main protagonist of the light novel/anime Youjo Senki: Saga of Tanya the Evil.

Originally a salaryman who died in an accident in 2013, he was reborn as a girl living in an alternate universe version of Europe during World War I.

At just nine years of age, Tanya enters the Empire's Mages Division and is promoted to Second Lieutenant.

Her talents, efficiency, and ruthlessness makes her an asset for the Empire and a threat on the battlefield.

Since she graduated from the War College as one of the twelve knights, she's granted the title of von.

Moreover, she leads her own newly-formed Wing Battalion named Imperial Army 203rd Air Mage Battalion known as V601.

APPEARANCE

During her time as a salaryman, she was a man with black hair and brown eyes. She wore a formal suit and a necktie.

Reincarnated as a girl, she now has blonde hair and blue eyes. She has a small figure and cute face with minimal height and weight of an eleven-year-old child.

Moreover, as a soldier, she always wears her military uniform including her Silver Wing Badge in civilian areas and a battle suit in the battlefield anytime and anywhere she goes.

PERSONALITY

She has a lot of characteristics of a villain which opposes her role as the main protagonist.

She is ruthless, deranged, cruel, aggressive and sometimes full of madness where her own battalion is terrified the most.

Although she does all these sadistic things, she makes sure she isn't breaking any of the rules or laws e. g. sending the war declaration.

However, she is always considerate of the situation she has to take.

She is a good strategist and planner.

She thinks of the best solution first before she acts towards the enemies or any challenges.

Even though she thinks of humans and her battalion as mere resources and doesn't care about them at all, she would never let any one of them die under her command because she is afraid it will give her a bad reputation and a terrible record.
She is sometimes clumsy when being overconfident; e.g during her interview with General Hans von Zettour. Yet, she can easily answer questions correctly and make the right choices.

PLOT

Past
Year 2013 A.D, he was just an ordinary salaryman. He fired a co-worker in order to get promoted and have a carefree life. After his ruthless actions, the fired co-worker pushed him down to the subway track right when the train is coming with incredible speed, causing him to get hit and killed on the spot. Before he died, he met Being X for the first time. Although, Being X failed to presuade him to believe in his existence, he still revives him but in another universe.

Present
After the reincarnation, Tanya was born into a blonde-haired girl in 1913. When she comes to her consciousness for the first time, she realized she was in an orphanage. She lived at the church for a long time without changes at her daily life however, it exhume until a group of specialist went to check all the children. Through a magical test, she was listed as a powerful child with incredible amount of mana. Furthermore, she was proven as an unexpectedly born with a skilled set of magic. Therefore, she was chosen to be in the Empire's Imperial Armed Forces. Enlisted as a prodigy or so-called scholar with special assumption.

Prologue/Deus lo vult; Chapter I: The Sky in Norden
At the age of 9, Tanya successfully graduated the Military Training Camp and promoted to Warrant Officer. Tanya took part in her first mission, promoted to Second Lieutenant quickly as an artillery observer to command the artillery firing squad. Unfortunately, she was attacked by a company during the midst of observation. She immediately informed an application for a retreat, however, she was ordered to delay the enemies for giving 600 seconds for reinforcement to came. Without hesitation, she dived into the enemy company and fought. Honored three confirmed kills and two severely injured (one kill and two injured in the LN), however she was admitted to the hospital for aid. She was rewarded a Silver Wings Assault medal and got free insurance in hospital for the impressive and unbelievable performance.

Deus Vult/Deus lo vult; Chapter II: Elinium Type 95 Operation Orb
Tanya was assigned to test out the unstable Elinium Type 95 Operation Orb which is majorly invented by Doctor Schugel. At the first flight while using the prototype orb, it exploded when she reached the maximum level (6,000 feet above sea level), Tanya was still unable to control it, taking slight injuries. Therefore, Tanya was really peeved when she was brought back to retest the explosive orb countless times and always fail to use it correctly and normally. After Being X blessed the Elinium Type 95 Operation Orb, it sprouted improvements. When she was pulled back the last time for the final check, she met Being X again while the orb is going to detonate during the flight, the only requirements to use the orb safely is to pray for the God which Being X solely stated before vanishing. Tanya has left no choice but to pray and grasp the control of the orb, successfully utilizing the orb. This made her thought that the orb was cursed equipment and not merely blessed thing.

ABILITIES

The tale has been stolen; if detected on Amazon, report the violation.

Physical Capacity
As a child, Tanya doesn't possess much physical strength. However, her physical range was reached out beyond a normal child's capabilities. She had sufficient strength to lift up a full-grown soldier that was dug deep in the snow. But is unable to escape from Anson Sioux's grip.
Air Combat. In live combat action, she is a dangerous killer whose purpose is to eliminate her opponents when ordered by the headquarters. Due to her small body, she can easily avoid bullets and the enemy. She can also fight in closed quarters combat with using a rifle with a knife.

Prayer/Blessing Magic

By using the Elinium Type 95, her eyes turn gold and her physical and mental psyche increases beyond the extent of a normal human. Moreover, she has medium accuracy in shooting but is able to cast a high tier powerful explosive spell that could destroy a whole company.

Strategy and Planning
Although she has an average record in planning and strategy, she has a special aptitude for analysis and critical thinking skills. Moreover, she can manipulate the plan according to her will. When Tanya gives orders to her subordinates, they can expect harsh punishments if they fail to comply.

Manipulator

Due to her extremely dangerous cuteness and small size, she can easily fool someone by using her skills e.g during her short conversation with previously ranked Captain Maximilian Johann von Ugar by persuading him to drop in the selection of being one of the Twelve Knights during War College Arc. Also she has an ability to fool anyone by her voice, e.g in light novel, manga, and anime version (Episode 5) where she used her child voice during the bombing of Dacian Capital.

QUOTES

Catchphrase : "Curse you, Being X!"

(Tanya to Visha) : "If you have time for idle chatter, spend it doing all you can to survive---We are soldiers. If the brass tells us to do something, we do it."

(Tanya to herself) : "It's all... Being X's fault. Until I pound free-market principles into that piece of shit, I won't die, no matter what! I'm going to live... to live and... I'm going to end this!"

(Tanya's Magic Ignition) : "God save the Fatherland."

(Tanya's second Magic Ignition) : "Lord, if the day comes when I fly through the heavens. I shall approach thee!"

(Tanya's Speech to her Battalion) : "If there is a God who rules this world, it is a stern, solemn, and definitely a good being. A being that is far too great. God keeps forcing us to confront these cruel fates. As those were the rules of this world! Oh, God... I'll slice you to tiny pieces and feed you to the pigs!Our battlefield is no place for that piece of shit, God! I think it's time we took over God's work. We, soldiers will take God's place. Put the arrogant ass, God, out of a job! All right troops... It's time for war!"

(Tanya to Being X) "You win the war but you lose to my human will. Now, let me escape in this world and I'll promise to keep in mind your proposal as your tool (Apostle)."

TRIVIA

Tanya Degurechaff was compared to the Fallen Hero of Germany named ? Manfred von Richthofen a.k.a Red Baron. Both of them are considered as "Ace of Aces" during their own World War.

Tanya was born on July 18 however her adoptive birthday is on September 24.

Her first name "Tanya" comes from the Greek word means "Sun".

According to the light novel and manga, she has a confirmed record of 62 kills and 32 assists after her departure in the Rhine.

In the manga, she is seemed to be worried about her height.

Her hobbies include that of drawing maps, carrying a rifle in civilian places and making plans to kill ? Being X.

She is the only person in their world to be able to fly more than 12,000 feet above sea level compared to an average person like the Republicans who can only fly a maximum of 8,000 feet. The standard battle altitude for normal mages is 6,000 feet.

According to LN and manga, she has her first thesis at age nine (titled The logistics behind a highly mobile war theater) that the different departments deeply recognized and being useful during war.

According to LN, manga and anime, although she doesn't restrict all her men to smoke, she sometimes get irritated to smokers who blow their smoke around the place without care for the second-hand smokers who will smell it, e.g in the anime version where she was called in the meeting where her superiors are smoking inside the room.

She doesn't like wearing feminine dresses due to the fact that she was a previously a forty year old salaryman.

Tanya doesn't know that she has a lot of men fall in love with her including Loliya.

Tanya likes chocolates, which  Viktoriya Ivanovna Serebryakov also likes, hence she ended up hiding it inside her room.

Tanya is skilled in playing cards, however the only person who can match her somehow is Viktoriya.

When fighting, Tanya uses her magic to activate anesthesia. Which can soothe her from the pain of her injuries and escape immediately.

According to the LN and manga, Tanya took quite numerous of shots on her limbs before self-destruction on her first mission. As in the anime, she was only hurt while self-destructing.

RELATIONSHIP

Being X
Due to being an Atheist, she refuses to acknowledge him as their Creator. Moreover because of his intervention, she loathes him so much to the point where she is ready to kill him anytime he shows himself.

Viktoriya Ivanovna Serebryakov
She is always thought of her as a tool for her promotion and achievements. Moreover, she thinks of her as one of the human resources beneficial to the Empire.

Adelheid von Schugel
He is the only person Tanya don't want to ever meet again. She is terrified of his craziest request and insane works.

Imperial Army 203rd Air Mage Battalion
She doesn't care for them at all and thinks of them as human resources for the Empire. However she is apprehensive of earning herself a bad reputation and record, she attempts to keep those under her command alive.According to LN Vol. 5, it was the oppose to the minds of her men because they think of her as their lovable superior due to her being mad of losing some of her troops in the battle. They mistakenly thought she was grieving to their lost comrades.In that event, they become more loyal and make her as their example to become patriotic and ready to sacrifice their lives inorder to protect not only the country but also her.

Salamander Combat Group
According to LN Vol. 4, Tanya thinks of them as a human resources for the benefits of the Empire to defeat the mere communist and not entirely the nationalist groups of Rus' Union.

Hans von Zettour
Because of his reputation as her superior officer, she deeply expresses her gratitude and respect.

Erich von Rerugen
Her relationship with him seems complicated and has not yet proven if she aware that he is terrified of her own charisma and personalities.

Lavrentiy Beria
Also known as Loliya, he fall in love at first sight at her. Loliya vows to do everything in his power to capture her, break her, and ravish her. So he decides that the Union needs to release the prisoners from the Gulag, particularly the mages (who were loyal to the previous Czarist regime), and win this war.

IMAGE GALLERY
